__hcfy__result__inline__">欢迎来到邮链</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></span><meta itemprop="position" content="1"></li></ul></nav><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Welcome To Mailchain<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">欢迎来到邮链</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p><a href="https://app.mailchain.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mailchain</a> is the communication layer for web3. It makes it possible for people to communicate in a crypto-native way. The platform consists of two parts:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 是 web3 的通信层。它使人们有可能以加密原生的方式进行交流。该平台由两部分组成：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ol><li>An open source, multi-chain protocol for sending encrypted messages between blockchain wallet addresses.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">一种开源的多链协议，用于在区块链钱包地址之间发送加密消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>A simple, unified inbox application that makes it easy for users to view and send messages using the protocol and to keep track of their on-chain activity. It's just like using email.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">一个简单、统一的收件箱应用程序，使用户可以使用该协议轻松查看和发送消息，并跟踪他们的链上活动。这就像使用电子邮件一样。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><p>People often need to communicate in the context of their wallet or blockchain identity. Communication may be related to their transaction history, web3 activity or some type of important notification.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">人们通常需要在他们的钱包或区块链身份的背景下进行交流。通信可能与他们的交易历史、web3 活动或某种类型的重要通知有关。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Use cases include trade receipts, transaction confirmations, peer-to-peer social messages, community updates, and other onchain events.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">用例包括交易收据、交易确认、点对点社交消息、社区更新和其他链上事件。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Web3 provides no standard way to handle communication. Some applications work around the problem by asking users to link another method of contact (e.g. email address, phone number etc.) to an application. This compromises privacy by asking users to link or reveal an identity. Keeping track of valuable, relevant information, such as NFT mints, DeFi positions, and DAO votes across these channels can become overwhelming, confusing, and pose a privacy risk.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Web3 没有提供处理通信的标准方式。一些应用程序通过要求用户将另一种联系方式（例如电子邮件地址、电话号码等）链接到应用程序来解决这个问题。这会要求用户链接或透露身份，从而损害隐私。通过这些渠道跟踪有价值的相关信息，例如 NFT 铸币厂、DeFi 头寸和 DAO 投票，可能会让人不知所措、令人困惑，并构成隐私风险。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Visit <a href="/user/guides/getting-started">Getting Started</a> to learn how to use the Mailchain application and start sending and receiving messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">访问入门以了解如何使用 Mailchain 应用程序并开始发送和接收消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav __hcfy__result__inline__">在本页</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Your Mailchain account is your new identity.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的 Mailchain 帐户是您的新身份。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>You can use it for messaging other Mailchain users or any blockchain addresses. Your identity is yours. Nobody, not even Mailchain has access to it. When you create a Mailchain account, two things happen:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以使用它向其他 Mailchain 用户或任何区块链地址发送消息。你的身份是你的。没有人，甚至 Mailchain 都无法访问它。当您创建 Mailchain 帐户时，会发生两件事：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ol><li>The Mailchain username that you choose is registered to your identity (which is linked to your <a href="#your-secret-recovery-phrase">Secret Recovery Phrase</a>).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您选择的 Mailchain 用户名已注册到您的身份（与您的秘密助记词相关联）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>You create a <a href="#your-safe-space">safe space</a> to keep your messages, registered addresses, labels, and other application data.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您创建一个安全空间来保存您的消息、注册地址、标签和其他应用程序数据。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="your-secret-recovery-phrase">Your Secret Recovery Phrase<a class="hash-link" href="#your-secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">你的秘密助记词</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Your <em>Secret Recovery Phrase</em> is a collection of words that can be used to access your Mailchain identity.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Your Secret Recovery Phrase 是一组单词，可用于访问您的 Mailchain 身份。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>If you lose this, you may not be able to recover your account (see <em>"What happens if I forget or lose my Secret Recovery Phrase?"</em> below). Store a copy of it somewhere safe (for example a password manager or written down and locked away).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您丢失了它，您可能无法恢复您的帐户（请参阅下面的“如果我忘记或丢失我的秘密恢复短语会怎样？”）。将它的副本存储在安全的地方（例如密码管理器或写下来并锁起来）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="your-safe-space">Your Safe Space<a class="hash-link" href="#your-safe-space" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">您的安全空间</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Your data is encrypted with a key derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase. This key never leaves your browser unencrypted. Your password is used to encrypt this key, which is stored on Mailchain's server. When you choose a password, it should be a very strong password or passphrase. You should store a copy of it somewhere safe (for example a password manager or written down and locked away).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的数据使用从您的秘密恢复短语派生的密钥加密。此密钥永远不会让您的浏览器处于未加密状态。您的密码用于加密此密钥，该密钥存储在 Mailchain 的服务器上。当您选择密码时，它应该是一个非常强的密码或密码。您应该将它的副本存储在安全的地方（例如密码管理器或记下来并锁起来）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="important-considerations">Important considerations<a class="hash-link" href="#important-considerations" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">重要注意事项</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-password">What happens if I forget or lose my password?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-password" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记或丢失密码怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget or lose your password, you can recover your account using your Secret Recovery Phrase.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记或丢失了密码，您可以使用您的秘密恢复短语恢复您的帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-secret-recovery-phrase">What happens if I forget or lose my Secret Recovery Phrase?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记或丢失了我的秘密助记词怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget or lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, you can recover your account if you know your Mailchain username and password.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记或丢失了您的 Secret Recovery Phrase，如果您知道您的 Mailchain 用户名和密码，则可以恢复您的帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-my-secret-recovery-phrase-and-my-password">What happens if I forget my Secret Recovery Phrase and my password?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-my-secret-recovery-phrase-and-my-password" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记了我的秘密助记词和密码会怎样？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget your Secret Recovery Phrase and your password, your account will be inaccessible.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记了您的秘密恢复短语和密码，您的帐户将无法访问。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="will-my-data-be-accessible-after-i-have-recovered-my-account">Will my data be accessible after I have recovered my account?<a class="hash-link" href="#will-my-data-be-accessible-after-i-have-recovered-my-account" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">恢复帐户后我的数据可以访问吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>When you log in to Mailchain with your Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination, your messages, registered wallets, settings, etc. will be accessible to you.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当您使用您的秘密恢复短语或用户名和密码组合登录 Mailchain 时，您将可以访问您的消息、注册的钱包、设置等。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-should-i-do-if-i-suspect-my-secret-recovery-phrase-or-username-and-password-combination-have-been-compromised">What should I do if I suspect my Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination have been compromised?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-should-i-do-if-i-suspect-my-secret-recovery-phrase-or-username-and-password-combination-have-been-compromised" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我怀疑我的秘密助记词或用户名和密码组合已被泄露，我该怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Any user who suspects their Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination has been compromised should create a new account and migrate their blockchain addresses by re-registering them with the new account. Any new messages will now use the messaging keys for the new account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">任何怀疑其 Secret Recovery Phrase 或用户名和密码组合已被泄露的用户都应创建一个新帐户并通过使用新帐户重新注册来迁移其区块链地址。任何新消息现在都将使用新帐户的消息密钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages __hcfy__result__inline__">在本页</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Mailchain gives you the ability to check for messages sent to any of your blockchain addresses through your unified inbox. Once you register your blockchain address, you can start sending and receiving messages via that address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 使您能够检查通过统一收件箱发送到任何区块链地址的消息。一旦你注册了你的区块链地址，你就可以开始通过该地址发送和接收消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Use cases include receiving notifications and communications based on your on-chain activities. You can also send messages from that address, and recipients can verify that the message originated from that address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">用例包括根据您的链上活动接收通知和通信。您还可以从该地址发送邮件，收件人可以验证邮件是否来自该地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-it-works">How it works<a class="hash-link" href="#how-it-works" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">它是如何工作的</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Your Mailchain account has an identity key, which is used to generate messaging keys. When you register an existing blockchain wallet address, you prove that you own it by signing a message of confirmation.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的 Mailchain 帐户有一个身份密钥，用于生成消息传递密钥。当您注册一个现有的区块链钱包地址时，您通过签署确认消息来证明您拥有它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>This generates a verifiable proof without requiring a blockchain transaction or gas fee. It can then be associated with a messaging key.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">这会生成可验证的证明，而无需区块链交易或汽油费。然后它可以与消息传递密钥相关联。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>When someone sends a message to your address, the application looks up your address at the registry lookup and receives a response containing the corresponding messaging key for your address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当有人向您的地址发送消息时，应用程序会在注册表查找中查找您的地址，并收到包含您地址的相应消息密钥的响应。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="bob-and-alice-use-case-example">Bob and Alice use case example<a class="hash-link" href="#bob-and-alice-use-case-example" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">鲍勃和爱丽丝用例示例</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Bob wants to send a message to Alice to let her know he has a new art collection coming out. He only knows the ethereum address she used when she bought his last piece. Alice has registered her ethereum address in Mailchain by signing a message confirming ownership with her wallet. Bob sends a message to Alice's address. In the background, the Mailchain application looks up Alice's address and gets the corresponding messaging key. The message is encrypted and routed using the messaging key details.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Bob 想给 Alice 发送一条消息，让她知道他有一个新的艺术收藏即将出版。他只知道她买他最后一块时用的以太坊地址。爱丽丝通过用她的钱包签署确认所有权的消息，在 Mailchain 中注册了她的以太坊地址。 Bob 向 Alice 的地址发送消息。在后台，Mailchain 应用程序查找 Alice 的地址并获取相应的消息传递密钥。使用消息传递密钥详细信息对消息进行加密和路由。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>When Alice opens her inbox, she can see a message from Bob sent to her ethereum address. Alice's identity and message key details are used by the application to obtain and decrypt the message body, but the private key information is never revealed.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当 Alice 打开她的收件箱时，她可以看到 Bob 发送到她的以太坊地址的消息。应用程序使用 Alice 的身份和消息密钥详细信息来获取和解密消息正文，但私钥信息永远不会泄露。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Bob has no way of knowing Alice has linked any other address to her Mailchain unified inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Bob 无法知道 Alice 已将任何其他地址链接到她的 Mailchain 统一收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>When Bob receives a reply from Alice, he can check that the message key details are valid without knowing anything else about Alice's identity.
Alice never had to enter any sensitive information to Mailchain, and she retains full control and ownership of her private keys for encryption and decryption.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当 Bob 收到 Alice 的回复时，他可以在不知道 Alice 身份的任何其他信息的情况下检查消息密钥详细信息是否有效。 Alice 无需向 Mailchain 输入任何敏感信息，并且她保留对加密和解密私钥的完全控制权和所有权。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="further-information">Further Information<a class="hash-link" href="#further-information" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Protecting Mailchain users is a priority for us. The decision to reserve usernames was taken to increase security and increase the chance in a fair way for community members to create an account with their preferred username. Mailchain usernames are non-transferable. They cannot be sold or traded so there is no benefit for someone to seize a collection of usernames for them to go unused.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">保护 Mailchain 用户是我们的首要任务。保留用户名的决定是为了提高安全性，并增加社区成员以公平的方式使用他们喜欢的用户名创建帐户的机会。 Mailchain 用户名不可转让。它们不能出售或交易，因此没有任何人可以获取一组用户名以供其闲置。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Mailchain reserved usernames for:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 为以下用户保留的用户名：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ul class=""><li>Names under 5 characters (see below for <a href="#how-can-i-request-a-reserved-username">how to request a name</a>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">5 个字符以下的姓名（请参阅下文了解如何申请姓名）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Known web3 projects (see below for <a href="#how-can-i-request-a-reserved-username">how to request a name</a>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">已知的 web3 项目（请参阅下文了解如何请求名称）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Administrative and support keywords<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">管理和支持关键字</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ul><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-caution alert alert--warning admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M8.893 1.5c-.183-.31-.52-.5-.887-.5s-.703.19-.886.5L.138 13.499a.98.98 0 0 0 0 1.001c.193.31.53.501.886.501h13.964c.367 0 .704-.19.877-.5a1.03 1.03 0 0 0 .01-1.002L8.893 1.5zm.133 11.497H6.987v-2.003h2.039v2.003zm0-3.004H6.987V5.987h2.039v4.006z"></path></svg></span>caution<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">警告</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Usernames in Mailchain are non-transferrable. Once a username has been taken, it cannot be reused.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 中的用户名不可转让。用户名一旦被使用，就不能再使用。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>DO NOT buy or accept a username from anyone. Once you create a Secret Recovery Phrase for an account, it cannot be changed. The original owner will always know the Secret Recovery Phrase associated with that Mailchain identity and can access its account data.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">不要购买或接受任何人的用户名。为帐户创建秘密恢复短语后，便无法更改。原始所有者将始终知道与该 Mailchain 身份关联的秘密恢复短语，并且可以访问其帐户数据。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-can-i-tell-if-a-username-is-reserved">How can I tell if a username is reserved?<a class="hash-link" href="#how-can-i-tell-if-a-username-is-reserved" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如何判断用户名是否已保留？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><ol><li><p>Go to <a href="https://app.mailchain.com/register" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://app.mailchain.com/register</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">前往 https://app.mailchain.com/register</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Type the username into the 'Username' field<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在“用户名”字段中输入用户名</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>If the username is reserved, the field will turn red and display the text:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果用户名已保留，该字段将变为红色并显示文本：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><blockquote><p>This username is reserved, contact support@mailchain if you want to claim it.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">此用户名已保留，如果您想申请，请联系 support@mailchain。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></blockquote></li><li><p>Alternatively, if the username is taken, the text will read:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">或者，如果用户名已被占用，文本将显示为：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><blockquote><p>This username is taken. Try another.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">该用户名已被使用。尝试另一个。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></blockquote><p>Or, if the username is unavailable for security reasons (e.g. admin@) the text will read:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">或者，如果出于安全原因用户名不可用（例如 admin@），文本将显示为：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><blockquote><p>This username is unavailable. Try another.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">此用户名不可用。尝试另一个。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></blockquote></li></ol><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-can-i-request-a-reserved-username">How can I request a reserved username?<a class="hash-link" href="#how-can-i-request-a-reserved-username" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">我如何申请保留的用户名？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>If you would like to claim a reserved username, please <a href="/getting-help">raise a support request</a> with details of the name you would like to register. class="breadcrumbs__item breadcrumbs__item--active"><span class="breadcrumbs__link" itemprop="name">Security &amp; Encryption<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">在本页</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Mailchain gives you complete ownership of your data. We’ve built Mailchain around the principle that only you should be able to view your private data.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 为您提供对数据的完全所有权。我们围绕只有您才能查看您的私人数据的原则构建了 Mailchain。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="end-to-end-encryption">End-to-End Encryption<a class="hash-link" href="#end-to-end-encryption" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">端到端加密</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>All Mailchain messages are encrypted end-to-end by default. To achieve complete end-to-end encryption, your private keys are never revealed to the Mailchain protocol. Your Secret Recovery Phrase is used to create a series a private keys that each perform independent actions which allow you to privately, register addresses, authenticate, store and save messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">默认情况下，所有 Mailchain 消息都是端到端加密的。为了实现完整的端到端加密，您的私钥永远不会透露给 Mailchain 协议。您的秘密恢复短语用于创建一系列私钥，每个私钥执行独立的操作，允许您私下注册地址、验证、存储和保存消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The Mailchain application encrypts your data in your browser before storing it with Mailchain, meaning only you can decrypt it. Mailchain cannot decrypt your data. This includes your Secret Recovery Phrase, messages, and registered addresses.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 应用程序会先在您的浏览器中加密您的数据，然后再使用 Mailchain 存储数据，这意味着只有您可以解密它。 Mailchain 无法解密您的数据。这包括您的秘密恢复短语、消息和注册地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="logging-in-to-mailchain">Logging in to Mailchain<a class="hash-link" href="#logging-in-to-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">登录 Mailchain</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>After you successfully authenticate with your username and password, a key that is known only to you, is used to encrypt your Secret Recovery Phrase. Your password is never sent to Mailchain in any form. This also means we have no way recover your account if you lose your password or are unable to complete any other account recovery options.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在您成功使用您的用户名和密码进行身份验证后，将使用一个只有您知道的密钥来加密您的 Secret Recovery Phrase。您的密码绝不会以任何形式发送到 Mailchain。这也意味着如果您丢失密码或无法完成任何其他帐户恢复选项，我们将无法恢复您的帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Please see <a href="/user/faqs/">FAQs</a> for more information on account recovery.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">有关帐户恢复的更多信息，请参阅常见问题解答。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="registering-a-wallet-address">Registering a Wallet Address<a class="hash-link" href="#registering-a-wallet-address" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">注册钱包地址</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Mailchain uses a messaging key in place of your wallet key to encrypt and decrypt messages for each address. Messaging keys are more secure for encryption and mean you don’t expose your wallet’s private key.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 使用消息传递密钥代替您的钱包密钥来加密和解密每个地址的消息。消息密钥加密更安全，这意味着您不会暴露钱包的私钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>When you register a wallet address with your Mailchain account, a new messaging key is generated. With your wallet, you sign a confirmation to indicate this key should be used for messaging. Signing this confirmation creates a proof that users can independently verify. The messaging private key is known only to you.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当您使用 Mailchain 帐户注册钱包地址时，会生成一个新的消息传递密钥。使用您的钱包，您签署确认以指示此密钥应用于消息传递。签署此确认书可创建用户可以独立验证的证明。消息私钥只有您知道。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Registered addresses are encrypted before being stored, and you only need to verify ownership of your wallet address once. Mailchain disconnects your wallet after your wallet has created the proof. Your wallet private key is never exposed.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">注册地址在存储前进行加密，您只需验证一次钱包地址的所有权。在您的钱包创建证明后，Mailchain 会断开您的钱包。您的钱包私钥永远不会暴露。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="sending-and-receiving-messages">Sending and Receiving Messages<a class="hash-link" href="#sending-and-receiving-messages" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">发送和接收消息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Each time a message is sent via Mailchain, a new encryption key is created to encrypt the message contents and its location. This encryption key is then encrypted uniquely for each address that is receiving the message. A new key is created for each recipient and for each new message.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">每次通过 Mailchain 发送消息时，都会创建一个新的加密密钥来加密消息内容及其位置。然后，该加密密钥会针对接收消息的每个地址进行唯一加密。为每个收件人和每个新消息创建一个新密钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Only the intended recipient(s) can recover the key then decrypt the location and message contents. All information within or about your messages, for example, sender, subject or date, is encrypted. Mailchain cannot read your messages, the storage provider cannot read your messages, your internet service provider cannot read your messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">只有预期的收件人才能恢复密钥，然后解密位置和消息内容。您的邮件中或关于您的邮件的所有信息，例如发件人、主题或日期，均已加密。 Mailchain 无法读取您的消息，存储提供商无法读取您的消息，您的互联网服务提供商无法读取您的消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>When a message is sent, the message is encrypted and stored on distributed storage. An encrypted "delivery request" holds information for the message recipient to be able to collect their encrypted message. Messages are held in an ephemeral transport layer until the message has been retrieved by all the recipients or until it expires.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">发送消息时，消息会被加密并存储在分布式存储中。加密的“传递请求”包含消息接收者能够收集其加密消息的信息。消息保存在临时传输层中，直到消息被所有收件人检索或直到消息过期。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="saving-messages">Saving Messages<a class="hash-link" href="#saving-messages" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">保存消息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>The Mailchain app will continuously check for new messages. Once a new message has been found, it is saved in your private inbox. Before being stored, messages are re-encrypted with a key that is specific to your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 应用程序将持续检查新消息。找到新消息后，它会保存在您的私人收件箱中。在存储之前，邮件会使用收件箱特定的密钥重新加密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Your inbox is designed to be intuitive and can be filtered in a familiar way but, it is secured so that only you can see and understand the relationships between your addresses and content. All IDs, filters and metadata are hashed or encrypted with a key derived from your private messaging key. Mailchain’s database cannot identify any relationships even if multiple addresses received the same messages; all the IDs, filters and content look completely different.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的收件箱设计直观，可以以熟悉的方式进行过滤，但它是安全的，因此只有您可以看到和理解您的地址和内容之间的关系。所有 ID、过滤器和元数据都使用从您的私人消息密钥派生的密钥进行散列或加密。即使多个地址收到相同的消息，Mailchain 的数据库也无法识别任何关系；所有的 ID、过滤器和内容看起来都完全不同。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages navigation"><a class="pagination-nav__link reserved some brand names and names under 5 characters long. For more information, see <a href="#reserved-names">reserved names</a> below.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 保留了一些品牌名称和长度在 5 个字符以下的名称。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的保留名称。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div></li><li><p>Choose a very strong password or passphrase.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">选择一个非常强的密码或密码。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-caution alert alert--warning admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 16 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M8.893 1.5c-.183-.31-.52-.5-.887-.5s-.703.19-.886.5L.138 13.499a.98.98 0 0 0 0 1.001c.193.31.53.501.886.501h13.964c.367 0 .704-.19.877-.5a1.03 1.03 0 0 0 .01-1.002L8.893 1.5zm.133 11.497H6.987v-2.003h2.039v2.003zm0-3.004H6.987V5.987h2.039v4.006z"></path></svg></span>caution<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">警告</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>You cannot reset your Mailchain password and if you lose it, you will need to restore your Mailchain identity using your Secret Recovery Phrase.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您无法重置您的 Mailchain 密码，如果您丢失了它，您将需要使用您的 Secret Recovery Phrase 恢复您的 Mailchain 身份。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Please add your username and password to a password manager or write it down and store it somewhere safe. See <a href="/user/concepts/understanding-mailchain-authentication">Understanding Mailchain Authentication</a> for more information.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请将您的用户名和密码添加到密码管理器或将其写下来并存放在安全的地方。有关详细信息，请参阅了解邮件链身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div></li><li><p>Take a moment to expand the 'Show advanced options' section and store your Secret Recovery Phrase.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">花点时间展开“显示高级选项”部分并存储您的秘密助记词。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-tip alert alert--success admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.5 0C3.48 0 1 2.19 1 5c0 .92.55 2.25 1 3 1.34 2.25 1.78 2.78 2 4v1h5v-1c.22-1.22.66-1.75 2-4 .45-.75 1-2.08 1-3 0-2.81-2.48-5-5.5-5zm3.64 7.48c-.25.44-.47.8-.67 1.11-.86 1.41-1.25 2.06-1.45 3.23-.02.05-.02.11-.02.17H5c0-.06 0-.13-.02-.17-.2-1.17-.59-1.83-1.45-3.23-.2-.31-.42-.67-.67-1.11C2.44 6.78 2 5.65 2 5c0-2.2 2.02-4 4.5-4 1.22 0 2.36.42 3.22 1.19C10.55 2.94 11 3.94 11 5c0 .66-.44 1.78-.86 2.48zM4 14h5c-.23 1.14-1.3 2-2.5 2s-2.27-.86-2.5-2z"></path></svg></span>tip<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">提示</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Please add your Secret Recovery Phrase to a password manager or write it down and store it somewhere safe. Losing this could mean you lose access to your Mailchain identity forever, so please store it somewhere safe.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请将您的 Secret Recovery Phrase 添加到密码管理器或将其写下来并存放在安全的地方。丢失它可能意味着您永远无法访问您的 Mailchain 身份，因此请将其存储在安全的地方。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div></li><li><p>Check the checkbox, assuming you have stored your password safely.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">假设您已安全存储密码，请选中该复选框。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Review the terms of service and privacy policy to ensure you are comfortable with what we offer, and how we do it.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">查看服务条款和隐私政策，以确保您对我们提供的服务以及我们的工作方式感到满意。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Pass the hCaptcha check to prove you are human.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">通过 hCaptcha 检查以证明您是人类。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Click 'Continue'.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">单击“继续”。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Next, you will be asked if you would like to download your Secret Recovery Phrase. If you did not follow previous warnings to write down and store the phrase, please ensure you select 'Download' and store the file securely so that others do not have access to it. Otherwise you can skip this step.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">接下来，系统会询问您是否要下载您的 Secret Recovery Phrase。如果您没有按照之前的警告写下并存储该短语，请确保您选择“下载”并安全地存储文件，以免其他人访问它。否则你可以跳过这一步。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li></ol><p>You now have access to your Mailchain inbox can either <a href="/user/concepts/understanding-connecting-wallets">register an existing blockchain wallet</a> or <a href="/user/guides/getting-started/send-a-mailchain-message">send a message.</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您现在可以访问您的 Mailchain 收件箱，可以注册现有的区块链钱包或发送消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="reserved-names">Reserved Names<a class="hash-link" href="#reserved-names" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">保留名称</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Mailchain reserved some usernames for known web3 projects and names under 5 characters.

class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如何连接和注册钱包</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>If you have an existing blockchain wallet, you can register the wallet to receive messages sent to that address. Visit <a href="/user/concepts/understanding-connecting-wallets">connecting and registering wallets</a> for more information.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您有现有的区块链钱包，您可以注册钱包以接收发送到该地址的消息。访问连接和注册钱包了解更多信息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Follow these steps to connect and register an existing blockchain wallet address:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请按照以下步骤连接并注册现有的区块链钱包地址：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ol><li><p>Click a button to open the connect wallet modal:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">单击一个按钮打开连接钱包模式：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" src="/assets/images/connect-buttons-71b72f2b6512ff27f62300e7afd2c022.png" width="600" height="338" class="img__Ss2"></p></li><li><p>Select a wallet provider (e.g. Metamask), then click 'Connect'<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">选择钱包提供商（例如 Metamask），然后单击“连接”</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" src="/assets/images/connect-wallet-1c6d78957fc117b891b640ce3761dd14.png" width="600" height="338" class="img__Ss2"></p></li><li><p>Choose the address to connect, then click Next.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">选择要连接的地址，然后单击下一步。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" src="/assets/images/connect-address-ca8891e0016ec379809011bcb6836604.png" width="600" height="338" class="img__Ss2"></p></li><li><p>Click 'Connect' to confirm Mailchain should be able to read your address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">单击“连接”以确认 Mailchain 应该能够读取您的地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" src="/assets/images/connect-address-confirm-57def2556431f2174eec7f713e18d37d.png" width="600" height="338" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>The address is now connected, but we need to register it in Mailchain. To do this:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">该地址现已连接，但我们需要在 Mailchain 中注册它。去做这个：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Click 'Verify Address'<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">点击“验证地址”</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" src="/assets/images/verify-address-button-ecef5b836b8a37534e6129876e6decca.png" width="600" height="338" class="img__Ss2"></p></li><li><p>A 'Signature Request' will appear in your wallet. It contains the following text:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">“签名请求”将出现在您的钱包中。它包含以下文本：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><blockquote><p>Message: <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">信息：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br>
Welcome to Mailchain! <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">欢迎来到邮链！</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br></p><p>Please sign to start using this address with Mailchain. This will not trigger a blockchain transaction or cost any gas fees. <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请签名以开始将此地址与 Mailchain 一起使用。这不会触发区块链交易或花费任何汽油费。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br></p><p>What's happening? <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">发生了什么？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br>
A messaging key will be registered with this address and used only for messaging. It will replace any existing registered messaging keys. <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">消息密钥将使用该地址注册并仅用于消息传递。它将替换任何现有的注册消息密钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br></p><p>Technical Details: <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">技术细节：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br>

class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的钱包现已通过验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Mailchain will check if you have any Web3 domain name services (e.g. ENS or __hcfy__result__inline__">阅读邮件链消息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1></header><h1>How To Read Mailchain Messages<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如何阅读邮件链消息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><ol><li><p>Log into your Mailchain account (or follow this guide to <a href="/user/guides/getting-started/create-a-mailchain-account">create an account</a>).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">登录您的 Mailchain 帐户（或按照本指南创建一个帐户）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>If you have not yet <a href="/user/concepts/understanding-connecting-wallets">connected a wallet address</a>, click 'Inbox' to view your messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您还没有连接钱包地址，请点击“收件箱”查看您的消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>If you have registered wallet addresses, you can view all your messages in 'All Inboxes'. To view the messages sent to a specific address select the corresponding inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您已经注册了钱包地址，您可以在“所有收件箱”中查看您的所有消息。要查看发送到特定地址的消息，请选择相应的收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li></ol><p>Each inbox displays the number of unread messages. When you select the inbox, any unread messages will have a blue dot next to them.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">每个收件箱都会显示未读邮件的数量。当您选择收件箱时，任何未读邮件旁边都会有一个蓝点。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>You can mark messages as read or unread, or carry out other actions including <em>star</em> to mark as important or <em>archive</em> to remove them from view.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以将消息标记为已读或未读，或执行其他操作，包括加星以标记为重要或存档以将其从视图中删除。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如何注册 .aurora 名称？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>The .aurora registry is operated by Freename. Visit <a href="https://freename.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Freename.io</a> and follow instructions on their site.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">.aurora 注册表由 Freename 运营。访问 Freename.io 并按照其网站上的说明进行操作。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="can-someone-send-me-a-mailchain-message-to-my-aurora-address-or-aurora-name">Can someone send me a Mailchain message to my Aurora address or .aurora name?<a class="hash-link" href="#can-someone-send-me-a-mailchain-message-to-my-aurora-address-or-aurora-name" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">有人可以向我的 Aurora 地址或 .aurora 名称发送 Mailchain 消息吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>You can ask anyone to send messages to your .aurora name or the wallet address you use on aurora… it’s a Web3 identity after all!<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以要求任何人向您的 .aurora 名称或您在 aurora 上使用的钱包地址发送消息……毕竟这是一个 Web3 身份！</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-when-someone-sends-a-message-to-my-aurora-name-in-mailchain">What happens when someone sends a message to my .aurora name in Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-when-someone-sends-a-message-to-my-aurora-name-in-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">当有人向我在 Mailchain 中的 .aurora 名称发送消息时会发生什么？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>When someone sends a Mailchain message to an Aurora name, Mailchain resolves the .aurora name and delivers the message to the resolved address (the address of registered owner of the .aurora NFT).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当有人向 Aurora 名称发送 Mailchain 消息时，Mailchain 解析 .aurora 名称并将消息传递到解析地址（.aurora NFT 的注册所有者的地址）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>If you are the owner of the minted name, then the message will arrive in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您是铸造名称的所有者，则该消息将到达您的收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-if-i-have-not-yet-registered-my-wallet-address-with-mailchain">What if I have not yet registered my wallet address with Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-if-i-have-not-yet-registered-my-wallet-address-with-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我还没有在 Mailchain 注册我的钱包地址怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you have not yet registered the wallet address with Mailchain, the protocol will still accept the encrypted message and store it for up to 90 days. You can synchronize messages for this address when you register the wallet address. (See <a href="/user/guides/name-services/aurora/aurora-getting-started#how-to-add-your-aurora-name-to-mailchain">How to add your .aurora name to Mailchain</a>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您尚未在 Mailchain 注册钱包地址，该协议仍会接受加密消息并将其存储最多 90 天。您可以在注册钱包地址时同步该地址的消息。 （请参阅如何将您的 .aurora 名称添加到 Mailchain）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 __hcfy__result__loaded__">检查您是否正在注册预期的钱包地址</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Check your .aurora name is minted and in your wallet<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">检查您的 .aurora 名称是否已创建并在您的钱包中</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-does-mailchain-resolve-aurora-names">How does __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Mailchain 如何解析 .aurora 名称？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain will always resolve the name from the <a href="https://freename.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Freename.io</a> resolver API so it will reflect the latest changes returned by the resolver.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 将始终从 Freename.io 解析器 API 解析名称，因此它将反映解析器返回的最新更改。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-no-longer-own-my-aurora-name">What happens if I no longer own my .aurora name?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-no-longer-own-my-aurora-name" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我不再拥有我的 .aurora 域名会怎样？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If your address is no longer the owner of the .aurora name, it will not resolve and Mailchain messages will no longer be sent to the address. If someone else registers the address that owns the name in Mailchain, they will be able to receive messages sent to the .aurora name. This will not have any impact on messages already in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您的地址不再是 .aurora 名称的所有者，它将无法解析并且 Mailchain 消息将不再发送到该地址。如果其他人在 Mailchain 中注册了拥有该名称的地址，他们将能够接收发送到 .aurora 名称的消息。这不会对您收件箱中已有的邮件产生任何影响。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" to send and receive messages. It’s simple to get started…<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 用户可以使用他们的 ENS 域来发送和接收消息。上手很简单……</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Mailchain message to ENS name" src="/assets/images/mailchain-mailto-messagetodaos-a37cbfaee59bea2b25e6b7ac8e8d334c.png" width="600" height="433" class="img__Ss2"></p><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p><em>The <a href="https://ens.domains" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Ethereum Name Service (ENS)</a> is a distributed, open, and extensible naming system based on the Ethereum blockchain.
ENS’s job is to map human-readable names like ‘alice.eth’ to machine-readable identifiers such as Ethereum addresses, other cryptocurrency addresses, content hashes, and metadata. ENS also supports ‘reverse resolution’, making it possible to associate metadata such as canonical names or interface descriptions with Ethereum addresses. —</em> Source: <a href="https://docs.ens.domains/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ENS Documentation</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Ethereum Name Service（ENS）是一个基于以太坊区块链的分布式、开放、可扩展的命名系统。 ENS 的工作是将人类可读的名称（如“alice.eth”）映射到机器可读的标识符（如以太坊地址、其他加密货币地址、内容哈希和元数据）。 ENS 还支持“反向解析”，可以将规范名称或接口描述等元数据与以太坊地址相关联。 — 来源：ENS 文档</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><hr><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-to-add-your-ens-name-to-mailchain">How To Add Your ENS Name To Mailchain<a class="hash-link" __hcfy__result__inline__">有人可以向我的 ENS 地址发送 Mailchain 消息吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>You can ask anyone to send messages to your ENS name… it’s a Web3 identity afterall!<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以要求任何人向您的 ENS 名称发送消息……毕竟这是一个 Web3 身份！</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" __hcfy__result__inline__">当有人向我在 Mailchain 中的 ENS 名称发送消息时会发生什么？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>When someone sends a Mailchain message to an ENS name, Mailchain resolves the ENS name and delivers the message to the ENS Resolved Address (the registered ETH address).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当有人向 ENS 名称发送 Mailchain 消息时，Mailchain 解析 ENS 名称并将消息传递到 ENS Resolved Address（注册的 ETH 地址）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="see ens name" src="/assets/images/ens_21-8ecbbf3239ba6dbf25a1d552d7b9204c.png" width="600" height="439" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>If you have already registered the wallet address, then the message will arrive in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您已经注册了钱包地址，那么该消息将到达您的收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" encrypted message and store it for up to 90 days. class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Freename Web3 域名入门</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1></header><p>Mailchain users can use their Freename Web3 domain names to send and receive messages. It’s simple to get started…<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 用户可以使用他们的 Freename Web3 域名来发送和接收消息。上手很简单……</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Untitled" src="/assets/images/freename-0-061f9b35cc8f5e1d4077e1c783b66c14.png" width="1200" height="675" class="img__Ss2"></p><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Freename (<a href="https://freename.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://freename.io</a>) is a web3 domain registrar for top-level domains (TLD) and second-level domains (SLD). Users can register and mint their own web3 TLDs and SLDs. These domains give people full ownership and control of their digital identity, with no renewal fees.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Freename (https://freename.io) 是顶级域名 (TLD) 和二级域名 (SLD) 的 web3 域名注册商。用户可以注册并创建自己的 web3 TLD 和 SLD。这些域名让人们可以完全拥有和控制他们的数字身份，无需续订费用。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><hr><h1>How To Add Your Freename Domain Name To Mailchain<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如何将您的 Freename 域名添加到 Mailchain</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="prerequisites">Prerequisites:<a class="hash-link" href="#prerequisites" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">先决条件：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><ul class="contains-task-list containsTaskList__YnT"><li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" disabled=""> You have a Mailchain account (see&nbsp;<a href="https://docs.mailchain.com/user/guides/getting-started/create-a-mailchain-account" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">here</a>).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您有一个 Mailchain 帐户（请参阅此处）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" disabled=""> Your wallet contains your Freename name (i.e. it contains an NFT of a name you either minted or had transferred to your wallet).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的钱包包含您的 Freename 名称（即它包含您铸造或转移到您钱包的名称的 NFT）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" disabled=""> The domain name should resolve to your wallet address. You can check this using <a href="https://whois.freename.io/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://whois.freename.io/</a> to check your address and name resolve correctly.

then the message will arrive in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您是铸造名称的所有者，则该消息将到达您的收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我还没有在 Mailchain 注册我的钱包地址怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you have not yet registered the wallet address with Mailchain, the protocol will still accept the encrypted message and store it for up to 90 days. You can synchronize messages for this address when you register the wallet address. (See <a href="/user/guides/name-services/freename/freename-getting-started#how-to-add-your-freename-domain-name-to-mailchain">How to add your Freename domain to Mailchain</a>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您尚未在 Mailchain 注册钱包地址，该协议仍会接受加密消息并将其存储最多 90 天。您可以在注册钱包地址时同步该地址的消息。 （请参阅如何将您的 Freename 域添加到 Mailchain）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 href="https://freename.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Freename.io</a> resolver API so it will reflect the latest changes returned by the resolver.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 将始终从 Freename.io 解析器 API 解析名称，因此它将反映解析器返回的最新更改。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" href="#what-address-record-does-mailchain-use-when-it-resolves-a-name" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Mailchain 在解析名称时使用什么地址记录？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain will resolve and return the first valid record from this order: <code>ETH</code> record, <code>Owner</code> record.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 将解析并返回此订单的第一个有效记录：ETH 记录、Owner 记录。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我不再拥有我的 Freename 域名会怎样？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If the Freename domain no longer resolves to your address, Mailchain messages will no longer be sent to your address either. If someone else registers a wallet address in Mailchain that the Freename domain resolves to, they will receive messages sent to the Freename domain. It’s simple to get started…<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 用户可以使用他们的 Unstoppable Domains 来发送和接收消息。上手很简单……</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Mailchain message to Unstoppable Domains" src="/assets/images/mailchain-UD-compose-bfac547037de942bbe59540bb4e41921.png" width="600" height="433" class="img__Ss2"></p><h1>Introduction<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p><em><a href="https://unstoppabledomains.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Unstoppable Domains</a> is an NFT domain name provider and digital identity platform working to onboard the world onto Web3. Unstoppable Domains offers NFT domains minted on the blockchain that give people full ownership and control of their digital identity, with no renewal fees. With Unstoppable Domains, people can replace lengthy alphanumeric crypto wallet addresses with a human-readable name and log into and transact with apps, wallets, exchanges and marketplaces.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Unstoppable Domains 是一个 NFT 域名提供商和数字身份平台，致力于将世界载入 Web3。 Unstoppable Domains 提供在区块链上铸造的 NFT 域，让人们完全拥有和控制他们的数字身份，无需续订费用。借助 Unstoppable Domains，人们可以将冗长的字母数字加密钱包地址替换为人类可读的名称，并登录应用程序、钱包、交易所和市场并进行交易。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></em></p><hr><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="can-someone-send-me-a-mailchain-message-to-my-ud-name">Can someone send me a Mailchain message to my UD name?<a class="hash-link" href="#can-someone-send-me-a-mailchain-message-to-my-ud-name" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">有人可以向我的 UD 名称发送邮件链消息吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>You can ask anyone to send messages to your UD name… it’s a Web3 identity afterall!<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以要求任何人向您的 UD 名称发送消息……毕竟这是 Web3 身份！</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-when-someone-sends-a-message-to-my-ud-name-in-mailchain">What happens when someone sends a message to my UD name in Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-when-someone-sends-a-message-to-my-ud-name-in-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">当有人向我在 Mailchain 中的 UD 名称发送消息时会发生什么？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>When someone sends a Mailchain message to a UD name, Mailchain resolves the UD name and delivers the message to the resolved owner address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当有人向 UD 名称发送 Mailchain 消息时，Mailchain 解析 UD 名称并将消息传递到解析的所有者地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="see UD name" src="/assets/images/ud_faq_1-e4da37f5d98f4d44e549c97ad3aa4833.png" width="1200" height="672" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>If you have already registered the wallet address, then the message will arrive in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您已经注册了钱包地址，那么该消息将到达您的收件箱。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-if-i-have-not-yet-registered-my-wallet-address-with-mailchain">What if I have not yet registered my wallet address with Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-if-i-have-not-yet-registered-my-wallet-address-with-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我还没有在 Mailchain 注册我的钱包地址怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you have not yet registered the wallet address with Mailchain, the protocol will still accept the encrypted message and store it for up to 90 days. You can synchronise messages for this address when you register the wallet address. (See <a href="/user/guides/name-services/unstoppable-domains/unstoppable-domains-getting-started#how-to-add-your-unstoppable-domain-to-mailchain">How to add your Unstoppable Domain to Mailchain</a>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您尚未在 Mailchain 注册钱包地址，该协议仍会接受加密消息并将其存储最多 90 天。您可以在注册钱包地址时同步该地址的消息。 （请参阅如何将 Unstoppable 域添加到 Mailchain）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-no-longer-own-my-ud-name">What happens if I no longer own my UD name?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-no-longer-own-my-ud-name" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我不再拥有我的 UD 名字会怎样？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If your address is no longer the owner of the UD name, it will not resolve and Mailchain messages will no longer be sent to the address. If someone else registers the address that owns the name in Mailchain, they will be able to receive messages sent to the UD name. This will not have any impact on messages already in your inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您的地址不再是 UD 名称的所有者，它将无法解析并且 Mailchain 消息将不再发送到该地址。如果其他人在 Mailchain 中注册了拥有该名称的地址，他们将能够接收发送到该 UD 名称的消息。这不会对您收件箱中已有的邮件产生任何影响。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="my-ud-name-was-not-found-what-should-i-check">My UD name was not found, what should I check?<a class="hash-link" href="#my-ud-name-was-not-found-what-should-i-check" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">找不到我的 UD 名称，我应该检查什么？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><ol><li><p>Check you are registering the intended wallet address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">检查您是否正在注册预期的钱包地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p>Check that the address appears in the <a href="https://ud.me" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://ud.me</a> profile.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">检查该地址是否出现在 https://ud.me 配置文件中。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="see UD name" src="/assets/images/ud_faq_2-bc48e10e8c68246210f33bb87306a005.png" width="1200" height="588" class="img__Ss2"></p></li></ol><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-does-mailchain-resolve-ud-names">How does Mailchain resolve UD names?<a class="hash-link" 如何解析 UD 名称？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain uses the Unstoppable Domains resolver API, so results will always reflect the Unstoppable Domains registry.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 使用 Unstoppable Domains 解析器 API，因此结果将始终反映 Unstoppable Domains 注册表。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="do-i-need-to-mint-an-unstoppable-domain-to-use-it-with-mailchain">Do I need to mint an Unstoppable Domain to use it with Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#do-i-need-to-mint-an-unstoppable-domain-to-use-it-with-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">我是否需要创建一个不可阻挡的域才能将其与 Mailchain 一起使用？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Yes, you need to "mint" your Unstoppable Domain to be able to use it with Mailchain. class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Your Secret Recovery Phrase, otherwise known as a mnemonic "Secret Recovery Phrase" is used to mathematically derive all the messaging keys, private keys, signatures and other secrets for your account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的秘密恢复短语，也称为助记“秘密恢复短语”，用于从数学上推导您帐户的所有消息密钥、私钥、签名和其他秘密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>It should never be shared with anyone because doing so would give full, irrevocable access to your account. A Secret Recovery Phrase cannot be changed or recovered.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">永远不要与任何人共享它，因为这样做会提供对您帐户的完全、不可撤销的访问权限。秘密恢复短语无法更改或恢复。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>For more information, please see <a href="/user/faqs#mailchain-account-security">Mailchain Account Security</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">有关更多信息，请参阅邮件链帐户安全</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-to-view-your-secret-recovery-phrase">How To View Your __hcfy__result__inline__">介绍</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Keeping your users informed is important, but hard to do in Web3.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">让你的用户了解情况很重要，但在 Web3 中很难做到。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Mailchain is a multi-chain communication protocol that helps you communicate with your users across any protocol. It provides end-to-end encryption by default, and supports 1:1, 1:many and group messaging.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 是一种多链通信协议，可帮助您跨任何协议与用户进行通信。默认提供端到端加密，支持1:1、1:many和群发。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Using Mailchain you can easily send messages to any blockchain address on different protocols. Mailchain solves your messaging needs so you can focus on building your application.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">使用 Mailchain，您可以轻松地将消息发送到不同协议上的任何区块链地址。 Mailchain 解决了您的消息传递需求，因此您可以专注于构建您的应用程序。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="sdk">SDK<a class="hash-link" href="#sdk" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">开发工具包</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>The preferred way to integrate with Mailchain is using our SDK. It takes care of the complexity working with the REST API including signing, verifying, encrypting, and decrypting.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">与 Mailchain 集成的首选方式是使用我们的 SDK。它负责处理使用 REST API 的复杂性，包括签名、验证、加密和解密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The API is on course to be decentralized and could be run by anyone. This presents some additional considerations when you call the endpoints. We built the SDK with these in mind and it securely handles the following specifications:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">API 正在去中心化，任何人都可以运行。当您调用端点时，这会提出一些额外的注意事项。我们在构建 SDK 时考虑到了这些，它可以安全地处理以下规范：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ul><li>Requests MUST be authenticated before they are transmitted, using the correct key.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请求必须在传输之前使用正确的密钥进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Requests containing private data MUST be encrypted with the correct key before being transmitted.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">包含私有数据的请求必须在传输前用正确的密钥加密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Responses MUST be verified to ensure they are valid and up to date.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">必须验证响应以确保它们有效且是最新的。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Responses containing encrypted data MUST be decrypted with the correct key before being read by the application.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">包含加密数据的响应必须在被应用程序读取之前用正确的密钥解密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ul><p>The SDK handles this safely and has a simple interface so you can easily send messages and work with validated API responses. The SDK is open source and the API is open to the public so you can independently verify this at any time.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">SDK 可以安全地处理此问题并具有简单的界面，因此您可以轻松发送消息并使用经过验证的 API 响应。 SDK 是开源的，API 是对外开放的，您可以随时独立验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>We think using the SDK is a better choice than calling the API directly, and we’d love to hear your feedback on how we can make it even better.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">我们认为使用 SDK 是比直接调用 API 更好的选择，我们很乐意听取您的反馈，告诉我们如何才能让它变得更好。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages navigation"><a class="pagination-nav__link provides broad support for known address schemes, including Mailchain accounts and identities, blockchain protocol addresses, Web3 names, and traditional email. The format is based on the RFC5322 Addr-Spec Specification to ensure maximum compatibility with other programs and future-proof support for potential address schemes (‘local-part’@’domain-part’).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 寻址为已知地址方案提供广泛支持，包括 Mailchain 帐户和身份、区块链协议地址、Web3 名称和传统电子邮件。该格式基于 RFC5322 Addr-Spec 规范，以确保与其他程序的最大兼容性和对潜在地址方案（‘local-part’@’domain-part’）的未来证明支持。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Please refer to the table below for definition and examples:<hcfy-result __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">认证</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>You own and control your account and its data. Mailchain does not have access to any data or messages. Access is only possible using your username and password combination or Secret Recovery Phrase. Mailchain cannot reset your credentials.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您拥有并控制您的帐户及其数据。 Mailchain 无权访问任何数据或消息。只能使用您的用户名和密码组合或秘密恢复短语进行访问。 Mailchain 无法重置您的凭据。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">笔记</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>You need a Mailchain account before you can authenticate with the SDK. You can <a href="/user/guides/getting-started/create-a-mailchain-account">create an account</a> through the <a href="https://app.mailchain.com/register" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">app</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在使用 SDK 进行身份验证之前，您需要一个 Mailchain 帐户。您可以通过该应用程序创建一个帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><p>Mailchain SDK's uses your private key to sign, decrypt and hash data. You need to authenticate the SDK to use any of the private methods such as sending a message.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain SDK 使用您的私钥来签署、解密和散列数据。您需要对 SDK 进行身份验证才能使用任何私有方法，例如发送消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Your private key never leaves your machine.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的私钥永远不会离开您的机器。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="sdk-methods">SDK Methods<a class="hash-link" href="#sdk-methods" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">SDK方法</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>There are multiple way to provide your private key to the Mailchain SDK. You can authenticate with your Secret Recovery Phrase, seed bytes, or password (coming soon).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">有多种方法可以将您的私钥提供给 Mailchain SDK。您可以使用您的秘密恢复短语、种子字节或密码（即将推出）进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-warning alert alert--danger admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.05.31c.81 2.17.41 3.38-.52 4.31C3.55 5.67 1.98 6.45.9 7.98c-1.45 2.05-1.7 6.53 3.53 7.7-2.2-1.16-2.67-4.52-.3-6.61-.61 2.03.53 3.33 1.94 2.86 1.39-.47 2.3.53 2.27 1.67-.02.78-.31 1.44-1.13 1.81 3.42-.59 4.78-3.42 4.78-5.56 0-2.84-2.53-3.22-1.25-5.61-1.52.13-2.03 1.13-1.89 2.75.09 1.08-1.02 1.8-1.86 1.33-.67-.41-.66-1.19-.06-1.78C8.18 5.31 8.68 2.45 5.05.32L5.03.3l.02.01z"></path></svg></span>danger<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">危险</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Your Secret Recovery Phrase, seed bytes, or private key can not be changed. They should be stored encrypted and provided to your application securely.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的秘密恢复短语、种子字节或私钥无法更改。它们应该加密存储并安全地提供给您的应用程序。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="secret-recovery-phrase">Secret Recovery Phrase<a class="hash-link" href="#secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">秘密助记词</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Use your Secret Recovery Phrase to provide your private key to the SDK. Secret Recovery Phrase's, a 24 word <a href="https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039.mediawiki" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BIP 39</a> compatible mnemonic phrase, which is used to create your private key.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">使用您的秘密恢复短语向 SDK 提供您的私钥。 Secret Recovery Phrase's，一个 24 字的 BIP 39 兼容助记词，用于创建您的私钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-ts codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">笔记</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>You can send a message to your <code>username@mailchain</code>, or if you've registered an ethereum address you can send a message to it (e.g. <code>0x.....@ethereum.mailchain.com</code>). You can also try sending a message to <code>0xbb56FbD7A2caC3e4C17936027102344127b7a112@ethereum.mailchain.com</code>, that's a valid, unmonitored address at Mailchain, we own the private key for it.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以向您的用户名@mailchain 发送消息，或者如果您已经注册了一个以太坊地址，您可以向它发送消息（例如 0x.....@ethereum.mailchain.com）。您也可以尝试向 0xbb56FbD7A2caC3e4C17936027102344127b7a112@ethereum.mailchain.com 发送消息，这是一个有效的、不受监控的 Mailchain 地址，我们拥有它的私钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><p>After the message is successfully sent you will be able to see it in your <a href="https://app.mailchain.com/sent" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">sent folder</a> and the recipient will see it in their inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">邮件发送成功后，您将能够在您的已发送文件夹中看到它，收件人将在他们的收件箱中看到它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">笔记</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>The Mailchain app checks for messages and updates the inbox in the background. You can force a refresh by clicking on the refresh icon above the list of messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 应用程序检查消息并在后台更新收件箱。您可以通过单击消息列表上方的刷新图标来强制刷新。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages navigation"><a class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="secret-recovery-phrase">Secret Recovery Phrase<a class="hash-link" href="#secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">秘密助记词</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>A Mailchain account is web3 identity, this means that the account is created via a private key that the user owns and controls. In Mailchain's case, the Secret Recovery Phrase creates the private key.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 帐户是 web3 身份，这意味着该帐户是通过用户拥有和控制的私钥创建的。在 Mailchain 的例子中，Secret Recovery Phrase 创建私钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-warning alert alert--danger admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.05.31c.81 2.17.41 3.38-.52 4.31C3.55 5.67 1.98 6.45.9 7.98c-1.45 2.05-1.7 6.53 3.53 7.7-2.2-1.16-2.67-4.52-.3-6.61-.61 2.03.53 3.33 1.94 2.86 1.39-.47 2.3.53 2.27 1.67-.02.78-.31 1.44-1.13 1.81 3.42-.59 4.78-3.42 4.78-5.56 0-2.84-2.53-3.22-1.25-5.61-1.52.13-2.03 1.13-1.89 2.75.09 1.08-1.02 1.8-1.86 1.33-.67-.41-.66-1.19-.06-1.78C8.18 5.31 8.68 2.45 5.05.32L5.03.3l.02.01z"></path></svg></span>danger<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">危险</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Whoever has the Secret Recovery Phrase controls the account. You should treat Secret Recovery Phrases as if they are private keys. They MUST be kept safely and only saved in a trusted store.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">谁拥有秘密恢复短语，谁就控制该帐户。您应该将 Secret Recovery Phrases 视为私钥。它们必须安全保存，并且只能保存在受信任的商店中。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><p>We suggest for development and testing that you use a Secret Recovery Phrase from a test account. Go ahead and create a <a href="https://app.mailchain.com/register" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">new account</a> if you don't already have one. Your Secret Recovery Phrase is available to view or download when you register your account. tutorial, you will have built an Express App, that exposes an API to send messages via Mailchain. Your API accepts POST requests meaning applications may use your API as a webhook commonly used to trigger notifications. Your app will use the <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mailchain/sdk" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mailchain SDK</a> to send messages and Bearer tokens to authenticate incoming requests. In most cases, you would add a route to an existing Express App, but for this tutorial, you'll create a new app.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在本教程结束时，您将构建一个 Express 应用程序，它公开一个 API 以通过 Mailchain 发送消息。您的 API 接受 POST 请求，这意味着应用程序可以将您的 API 用作通常用于触发通知的 webhook。您的应用程序将使用 Mailchain SDK 发送消息和 Bearer 令牌来验证传入请求。在大多数情况下，您会向现有的 Express 应用添加路由，但对于本教程，您将创建一个新应用。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="prerequisites">Prerequisites<a class="hash-link" href="#prerequisites" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">先决条件</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>This guide adds authentication to an existing endpoint for sending messages. href="/developer/tutorials/send-via-api">send via API</a> guide.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">完成通过 API 发送指南。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><a
