__hcfy__result__loaded__">为开发和测试目的创建一个新的 Mailchain 帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-1---install-passport">Step 1 - Install passport<a class="hash-link" href="#step-1---install-passport" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 1 步 - 安装护照</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>The existing API we built in the previous guide is unauthenticated, meaning it accepts any valid POST request and sends a message. <a href="https://www.passportjs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Passport</a> authenticates the API requests.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">我们在上一指南中构建的现有 API 未经身份验证，这意味着它接受任何有效的 POST 请求并发送消息。 Passport 对 API 请求进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To install <code>passport</code> and <code>passport-http-bearer</code> libraries and types, open a terminal window and navigate the root directory of your code, then run:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要安装 passport 和 passport-http-bearer 库和类型，请打开终端窗口并导航到代码的根目录，然后运行：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-bash codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">npm</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span 58, 52);"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">npm</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">install</span><span class="token plain"> --save--dev @types/passport @types/passport-http-bearer</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/passport" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">passport</a> provides multiple different authentication strategies for APIs and works with Express. <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/passport-http-bearer" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">passport-http-bearer</a> configures Passport to use the bearer strategy for authentication.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">passport 为 API 提供了多种不同的身份验证策略，并与 Express 一起工作。 passport-http-bearer 将 Passport 配置为使用承载策略进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><hr><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-2---generate-authentication-tokens">Step 2 - Generate authentication tokens<a class="hash-link" href="#step-2---generate-authentication-tokens" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 2 步 - 生成身份验证令牌</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Your API will use the bearer authentication scheme to authenticate requests. You'll need to create a list of known tokens and provide them to the application. Passport then looks at the request token and searches for it in the known tokens list.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的 API 将使用承载身份验证方案来验证请求。您需要创建一个已知令牌列表并将它们提供给应用程序。 Passport 然后查看请求令牌并在已知令牌列表中搜索它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="bearer-authentication-scheme">Bearer authentication scheme<a class="hash-link" href="#bearer-authentication-scheme" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">承载认证方案</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>HTTP requests use the <code>Authentication</code> header to send authentication details to the server. <code>Authentication</code> headers specify the method or authentication scheme and credentials. Bearer is an authentication scheme commonly used to authenticate HTTP API requests. The format for a <code>Bearer</code> authentication header is:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">HTTP 请求使用身份验证标头将身份验证详细信息发送到服务器。身份验证标头指定方法或身份验证方案和凭据。 Bearer 是一种通常用于对 HTTP API 请求进行身份验证的身份验证方案。 Bearer 身份验证标头的格式为：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">"Authorization: Bearer {token}"</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note alert alert--secondary admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">笔记</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>The value of the token can be anything, usually a random generated string that is meaningless to the client. Random values make for easy authentication but since the request is not signed. Care must be taken to properly protect the token as anyone with the token can make requests.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">令牌的值可以是任何东西，通常是随机生成的对客户端无意义的字符串。随机值有助于轻松进行身份验证，但因为请求未签名。必须注意妥善保护令牌，因为任何拥有令牌的人都可以发出请求。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="generate-tokens">Generate tokens<a class="hash-link" href="#generate-tokens" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">生成代币</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>You need to use a secure random generator to safely generate bearer tokens. The latest version of <code>openssl</code> implements a secure random generator that generates and formats random values of any length.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您需要使用安全的随机生成器来安全地生成不记名令牌。最新版本的 openssl 实现了一个安全的随机生成器，可以生成和格式化任意长度的随机值。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Open a terminal window and execute the following command:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">打开终端窗口并执行以下命令：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-bash codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">openssl rand </span><span class="token number" style="color: rgb(54, 172, 170);">32</span><span class="token plain"> -hex</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Try running it again, notice that each time you run it you get a different unique value.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">尝试再次运行它，请注意每次运行它都会获得不同的唯一值。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><hr><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-3---provide-tokens-to-app">Step 3 - Provide tokens to app<a class="hash-link" href="#step-3---provide-tokens-to-app" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 3 步 - 向应用程序提供令牌</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Your app will extract the bearer token from the HTTP request <code>Authorization</code> header. It will then look for the supplied bearer token in a list of known tokens. If it finds a match then the server will authenticate the request.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的应用将从 HTTP 请求授权标头中提取不记名令牌。然后它将在已知令牌列表中查找提供的不记名令牌。如果找到匹配项，则服务器将对请求进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The known tokens are stored in the <code>BEARER_TOKENS</code> environment variable. <code>BEARER_TOKENS</code> is a comma separated list, meaning you can join multiple outputs from <a href="#generate-tokens">generate tokens</a> with commas to create a list of tokens for you API. Paste the following command in your terminal window to quickly generate 3 random tokens separated by commas:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">已知令牌存储在 BEARER_TOKENS 环境变量中。 BEARER_TOKENS 是一个逗号分隔的列表，这意味着您可以使用逗号连接生成令牌的多个输出，为您的 API 创建一个令牌列表。将以下命令粘贴到您的终端窗口中，以快速生成 3 个以逗号分隔的随机标记：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code send ‘login’ Magic links to any EVM-compatible blockchain address, ENS name or Unstoppable domain.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">本教程向您展示如何创建“登录”Magic 链接并将其发送到任何 __hcfy__result__inline__">解决方案概述</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>In this tutorial, you will build a todo list app, complete with functionality that allows users to sign in with Mailchain. By following along with this tutorial, you will learn how to use Passport for passwordless authentication using Mailchain to send magic links.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在本教程中，您将构建一个待办事项列表应用程序，其中包含允许用户使用 Mailchain 登录的功能。通过跟随本教程，您将学习如何使用 Passport 进行无密码身份验证，使用 Mailchain 发送魔术链接。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>As you work through the tutorial, you'll be using&nbsp;<a href="https://expressjs.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Express</a> as our web framework, along with&nbsp;<a href="https://ejs.co/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">EJS</a> as our template engine and&nbsp;<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CSS</a> for styling. You will use&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/mapbox/node-sqlite3" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SQLite</a> as our database for storing data. Don't worry if you are not familiar with these technologies -- the necessary code will be provided at each step.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在学习本教程时，您将使用 Express 作为我们的 Web 框架，同时使用 EJS 作为我们的模板引擎和 CSS 进行样式设置。您将使用 SQLite 作为我们存储数据的数据库。如果您不熟悉这些技术，请不要担心——每个步骤都会提供必要的代码。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>You can find an example of the final result here <a href="https://github.com/mailchain/todos-express-mailchain" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/mailchain/todos-express-mailchain</a> on Github.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以在 Github 上的 https://github.com/mailchain/todos-express-mailchain 找到最终结果的示例。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="prerequisites">Prerequisites<a class="hash-link" href="#prerequisites" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">先决条件</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>To complete this tutorial, you need:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要完成本教程，您需要：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>A working development environment with&nbsp;<a href="https://nodejs.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Node.js</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href="https://git-scm.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Git</a> 2. class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">通过 Mailchain 的 Stytch 无密码魔术链接</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1></header><p>At the end of this tutorial, you will have built an Express JS app that sends a passwordless magic link from the <a href="https://stytch.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stytch auth platform</a> to the user's wallet address using <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mailchain/sdk" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mailchain's SDK</a> and protocol.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在本教程结束时，您将构建一个 Express JS 应用程序，该应用程序使用 Mailchain 的 SDK 和协议从 Stytch 身份验证平台向用户的钱包地址发送一个无密码的魔法链接。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="The final result" src="/assets/images/final-result-860d2958d66541f85c8ea4c14de18caa.png" width="1280" height="251" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>Stytch supports multiple authentication methods, including the so-called <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/magic-links" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">magic link</a>. Magic links work by generating and sending a link with an unique authentication token to an address.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Stytch 支持多种身份验证方法，包括所谓的魔术链接。魔术链接的工作原理是生成一个带有唯一身份验证令牌的链接并将其发送到一个地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The recipient can prove they own the address by clicking on the link within the message. The link contains an unique and single use authentication token, When a user clicks the Magic Link, the application's authentication service processes and validates the authentication token and creates a user session. For more details and visual representation of the flow, check out Stytch's <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/magic-links#email-magic-links" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Email Magic Link overview</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">收件人可以通过单击消息中的链接来证明他们拥有该地址。该链接包含一个唯一且一次性使用的身份验证令牌，当用户单击 Magic Link 时，应用程序的身份验证服务会处理并验证身份验证令牌并创建用户会话。有关流程的更多详细信息和可视化表示，请查看 Stytch 的 Email Magic Link 概述。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To send messages via Mailchain you need to use Stytch's <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/magic-links#embeddable-magic-links" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Embeddable Magic Link</a>. This lets you send magic links via a custom channel.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要通过 Mailchain 发送消息，您需要使用 Stytch 的 Embeddable Magic Link。这使您可以通过自定义渠道发送魔术链接。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Since Mailchain requires any registered wallet address to have sign a proof to verify ownership. Applications can build upon that proof, and Mailchain's built-in sender and recipient verification to reliably prove address ownership.
.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">由于 Mailchain 要求任何注册的钱包地址必须签署证明以验证所有权。应用程序可以基于该证明和 Mailchain 的内置发件人和收件人验证来可靠地证明地址所有权。 .</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="prerequisites">Prerequisites<a class="hash-link" href="#prerequisites" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">先决条件</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><ol><li>Download and install <a href="https://nodejs.org/en/download/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NodeJS</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">下载并安装 NodeJS。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><a href="/user/guides/getting-started/create-a-mailchain-account">Create new Mailchain account</a> for development and testing purposes.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">为开发和测试目的创建新的 Mailchain 帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Sign for or use your existing <a href="https://stytch.com/start-now" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stytch auth account</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">登录或使用您现有的 Stytch 授权帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><div class="theme-admonition class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">信息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>At the time of writing this tutorial, Stytch offers its Embeddable Magic Link feature on-demand to maintain good security practices.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在编写本教程时，Stytch 按需提供其 Embeddable Magic Link 功能以维护良好的安全实践。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>You can find out more about this here: <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/api/create-magic-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Create embeddable magic link</a>, but in summary you need to send a message to <code>support@stytch.com</code> briefly explaining your use case (you can mention this tutorial and send a link). They will provide you with additional security and usage information then enable the feature for you. Requirements around this may change in future.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">你可以在这里找到更多相关信息：Create embeddable magic link，但总而言之，你需要发送消息到 support@stytch.com 简要说明你的用例（你可以提及本教程并发送链接）。他们将为您提供额外的安全和使用信息，然后为您启用该功能。围绕此的要求将来可能会发生变化。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-1---clone-stytch-node-magic-link-example">Step 1 - Clone Stytch Node Magic Link example<a class="hash-link" href="#step-1---clone-stytch-node-magic-link-example" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 1 步 - 克隆 Stytch 节点 Magic Link 示例</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Along with great documentation and quick getting started guides, Stytch offers quick bare-bones examples for multiple platforms with magic link endpoints pre-configured, including an example for Node running an Express JS. Lets start by cloning the repository so we will build on top of it:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">除了出色的文档和快速入门指南外，Stytch 还为多个平台提供了快速的基本示例，这些平台具有预配置的魔术链接端点，包括运行 Express JS 的 Node 示例。让我们从克隆存储库开始，以便我们在其之上构建：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; Install the latest version by running:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Stytch 正在积极开发中，因此示例中使用的 Stytch SDK 可能已过时。通过运行安装最新版本：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-bash codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">npm</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">install</span><span class="token plain"> stytch@latest</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-2---configure-stytch">Step 2 - Configure Stytch<a class="hash-link" href="#step-2---configure-stytch" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 2 步 - 配置 Stytch</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Navigate to <a href="https://stytch.com/dashboard/api-keys" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stytch Dashboard &gt; API Keys</a>. Copy the values for <code>'Project ID'</code> and <code>'Secret'</code> and paste them into their corresponding fields in the <code>.env</code> file in the repository you cloned in the previous step.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">导航到 Stytch 仪表板 &gt; API 密钥。复制“项目 ID”和“机密”的值，并将它们粘贴到您在上一步中克隆的存储库中的 .env 文件中的相应字段中。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Copy the API Keys" src="/assets/images/api-keys-3d08000946c3abeeb9e00a7cf4f52e98.png" width="1200" height="577" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>The <code>.env</code> should be similar to this:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">.env 应该与此类似：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-txt codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-txt codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">PORT='4567'</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">STYTCH_PROJECT_ID='project-test-66311e...'</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">STYTCH_SECRET='secret-test-SMmIhy...'</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Now that we have added some secrets to our <code>'.env'</code> file, we should make sure we do not commit this to our git repository. --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-txt codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">node_modules</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain" style="display: inline-block;"></span><br></span><span class="token-line theme-code-block-highlighted-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">.env</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain" style="display: inline-block;"></span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Now we need to configure a redirect URL in Stytch. This is used once a user is authenticated, so a user can be redirected back to your application. To configure the redirect URL, go to <a href="https://stytch.com/dashboard/redirect-urls" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stytch Dashboard &gt; Redirect URLs</a> and add <code>http://localhost:4567/authenticate</code> then select the type of Login and Sign Up.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">现在我们需要在 Stytch 中配置一个重定向 URL。一旦用户通过身份验证就会使用它，因此可以将用户重定向回您的应用程序。要配置重定向 URL，请转到 Stytch 仪表板 &gt; 重定向 URL 并添加 http://localhost:4567/authenticate，然后选择登录和注册的类型。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Configure the Redirect URLs" src="/assets/images/redirect-url-5a84aa769a9c57820a450f1144549343.png" width="1200" height="951" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>To make sure that everything is working at this point, we can test our app using a traditional email magic link.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">为确保此时一切正常，我们可以使用传统的电子邮件魔术链接测试我们的应用程序。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To start the app, run:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要启动应用程序，请运行：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-bash codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">npm</span><span class="token plain"> start</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>In a browser navigate to <a href="http://localhost:4567" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">http://localhost:4567</a>, which should show a page containing a form with an email address field.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在浏览器中导航到 http://localhost:4567，它应该显示一个页面，其中包含一个带有电子邮件地址字段的表单。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To verify that email magic link is working, input your traditional (non-Web3) email address. For free tier Stytch accounts without payment card info, it must be on the same domain as the one used for the account. You should be redirected to <code>http://localhost:4567/login_or_create_user</code>, while also receiving email message containing a magic link in your traditional email inbox.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要验证电子邮件魔术链接是否有效，请输入您的传统（非 Web3）电子邮件地址。对于没有支付卡信息的免费层级 Stytch 帐户，它必须与用于该帐户的域位于同一域中。您应该被重定向到 http://localhost:4567/login_or_create_user，同时还会在您的传统电子邮件收件箱中收到包含魔术链接的电子邮件。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Clicking on the magic link should open the application in the browser with a welcome message. This means Stytch is setup correctly and you can proceed with the rest of the tutorial.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">单击魔术链接应在浏览器中打开应用程序并显示欢迎消息。这意味着 Stytch 设置正确，您可以继续本教程的其余部分。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>If you have any issues, please trace back through the steps or drop us a line on our <a href="https://discord.gg/2gqGpagbhe" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Discord</a> server.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您有任何问题，请追溯这些步骤或在我们的 Discord 服务器上给我们留言。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-3---configure-the-mailchain-sdk">Step 3 - Configure the Mailchain SDK<a class="hash-link" href="#step-3---configure-the-mailchain-sdk" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 3 步 - 配置 Mailchain SDK</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>Configuring the Mailchain SDK is simple. Once the package is installed and configured, it can send Web3 mails via the Mailchain protocol to wallet addresses or other Web3 identities.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">配置 Mailchain SDK 很简单。安装和配置包后，它可以通过 Mailchain 协议将 Web3 邮件发送到钱包地址或其他 Web3 身份。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To install the Mailchain SDK, stop the application if it is running (hint: <code>CTRL/Control+C</code> on most machines) and run:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要安装 Mailchain SDK，请停止正在运行的应用程序（提示：在大多数机器上按 CTRL/Control+C）并运行：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-bash codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-bash codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">npm</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token function" style="color: rgb(215, 58, 73);">install</span><span class="token plain"> @mailchain/sdk</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Next, open the <code>.env</code> file and insert your Mailchain Secret Recovery Phrase into it. If you don't know your secret recovery phrase, head over to <a href="https://docs.mailchain.com/user/guides/settings/secret-recovery-phrase" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Secret Recovery Phrase Introduction</a> and to learn how to get it from your Mailchain account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">接下来，打开 .env 文件并将您的 Mailchain Secret Recovery Phrase 插入其中。如果您不知道您的秘密恢复短语，请前往秘密恢复短语介绍并了解如何从您的 Mailchain 帐户中获取它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-txt codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">PORT='4567'</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">STYTCH_PROJECT_ID='project-test-66311e...'</span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">STYTCH_SECRET='secret-test-SMmIhy...'</span><br></span><span class="token-line theme-code-block-highlighted-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token 4 - Identity Mailchain address<a class="hash-link" href="#step-4---identity-mailchain-address" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 4 步 - 身份邮件链地址</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>At this point, you need to open <code>stytch-node-magic-links</code> folder in your favorite code editor so you can make changes to the code.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">此时，您需要在您喜欢的代码编辑器中打开 stytch-node-magic-links 文件夹，以便对代码进行更改。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>In the <code>'server.js'</code> there is pre-configured Express JS application with the routes that we will need for our authentication solution. In summary, we will work mainly on <code>/login_or_create_user</code> route where we will add the Mailchain mail sending logic. All the other routes will remain the same, this includes the <code>/authenticate</code> route that will be responsible for verifying the token from the magic link.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在“server.js”中有预配置的 Express JS 应用程序，其中包含我们的身份验证解决方案所需的路由。总之，我们将主要在 /login_or_create_user 路由上工作，我们将在其中添加 Mailchain 邮件发送逻辑。所有其他路由将保持不变，这包括 /authenticate 路由，该路由将负责验证来自魔术链接的令牌。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>As mentioned before, our application will work seamlessly with both regular Web2 email addresses and also with the Web3 Mailchain addresses. Lets implement a naive (emphasis on <strong>naive</strong>) to demonstrate this. All Mailchain addresses, both for Mailchain Accounts and for other Web3 identities such as Ethereum, ENS addresses, will end with <code>mailchain.com</code>, for example <code>alice@mailchain.com</code> or <code>epistola.eth@ens.mailchain.com</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如前所述，我们的应用程序将与常规 Web2 电子邮件地址和 Web3 When the user inputs an email address that doesn't exist, it will create a new Stytch user and send out a corresponding magic link to that user. Otherwise, when the email is already registered to a user, it will reference the existing user in the magic link. This is useful for providing better context to users. Read more here: <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/api/log-in-or-create-user-by-email" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Log in or create user by email</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">这种 Stytch 方法用于通过传统电子邮件发送魔法链接。当用户输入一个不存在的电子邮件地址时，它将创建一个新的 Stytch 用户并向该用户发送一个相应的魔术链接。否则，当电子邮件已经注册到用户时，它将在魔术链接中引用现有用户。这对于为用户提供更好的上下文很有用。在此处阅读更多信息：通过电子邮件登录或创建用户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>We will implement the same behavior for Mailchain addresses. Among other properties, the Stytch User object stores the user email address, which we will use this to store the user's Mailchain address. To make this easier, Stytch offers useful methods for <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/api/search-users" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">searching existing users</a> and methods for <a href="https://stytch.com/docs/api/create-user" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">creating new user</a>. API to listen for ethereum address activity (e.g. ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 transfer events).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在本教程结束时，我们将构建一个简单的 Express 应用程序，它公开一个 API 来侦听以太坊地址活动（例如 ERC20、ERC721 和 ERC1155 传输事件）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Final result image" src="/assets/images/result-6f3b8855364582bef03cd808fc168678.png" width="1600" height="359" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>We will be using the <a href="https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/notify-api-quickstart" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Alchemy Notify API quickstart</a>. It provides easy-to-use webhook triggers based on transactions and events, and supports multiple <a href="https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/webhook-types" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">webhook event types</a>. We will use the <a href="https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/address-activity-webhook" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Address Activity Webhook</a> to send a mail to your ethereum address when a transaction occurs. The code for the webhook is based on the <a href="/developer/tutorials/authenticated-webhook">Authenticated webhook tutorial</a>, which is not a prerequisite, but can be helpful to review.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">我们将使用 Alchemy Notify API 快速入门。它提供基于事务和事件的易于使用的 webhook 触发器，并支持多种 webhook 事件类型。当交易发生时，我们将使用 Address Activity Webhook 向您的以太坊地址发送邮件。 webhook 的代码基于经过身份验证的 webhook 教程，这不是先决条件，但有助于复习。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="prerequisites">Prerequisites<a class="hash-link" href="#prerequisites" This will open up a form with some input fields:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在 Notify Alchemy Dashboard 的 Address Activity 部分下，单击 + CREATE WEBHOOK 按钮。这将打开一个带有一些输入字段的表单：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ul class=""><li><strong>Chain</strong>: Select <code>Ethereum</code><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">链：选择以太坊</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><strong>Network</strong>: For testing purposes select <code>Goerli</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">网络：出于测试目的，选择 Goerli。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><strong>Webhook URL</strong>: Paste in the <code>Forwarding</code> value from ngrok followed with <code>/webhook-path</code> (ex. <code>https://012a-93-12-152-21.eu.ngrok.io/webhook-path</code>)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Webhook URL：粘贴来自 ngrok 的 Forwarding 值，后跟 /webhook-path（例如 https://012a-93-12-152-21.eu.ngrok.io/webhook-path）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><strong>Ethereum Addresses</strong>: This is the address that will be monitored. Enter the Ethereum address that you have registered to Mailchain and that you want to monitor for events. An Ethereum address will look something like <code>0xEBaae0531dF65ee3a1623f324C9620bB84c8af8f</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">以太坊地址：这是将被监控的地址。输入您已注册到 Mailchain 并要监视事件的以太坊地址。以太坊地址类似于 0xEBaae0531dF65ee3a1623f324C9620bB84c8af8f。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Click on the <code>CREATE WEBHOOK</code> to finish creating the web hook.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">单击 CREATE WEBHOOK 以完成创建 Web 挂钩。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ul></li></ol><p><a href="https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/notify-api-quickstart#webhook-signature--security" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Alchemy signs each webhook requests</a> to prevent un authorized access. In the example app, signatures are validated by the <code>validateAlchemySignature</code> method.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Alchemy 对每个 webhook 请求进行签名以防止未经授权的访问。在示例应用程序中，签名由 validateAlchemySignature 方法验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To make this example work and validate the signature against the correct key, we need to get the "webhook signing key". Later which we will set this in our application.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要使此示例正常运行并根据正确的密钥验证签名，我们需要获取“webhook 签名密钥”。稍后我们将在我们的应用程序中设置它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>To get the "webhook signing key", navigate to the Notify Alchemy Dashboard and scroll down to the webhook and by clicking on the options <code>⋯</code> button, then click <code>Signing Key</code>. A box will open with the signing key, it will look something like <code>whsec_EcQnhWcncVkYyda2UgL15kiL</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要获取“webhook signing key”，请导航至 Notify Alchemy Dashboard 并向下滚动至 webhook，然后单击选项⋯按钮，然后单击 Signing Key。将打开一个带有签名密钥的框，它看起来类似于 whsec_EcQnhWcncVkYyda2UgL15kiL。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="How to copy the singing key" src="/assets/images/signing-key-fd5fb581e4a571c58c23d4e6a52bb498.png" width="1600" height="598" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>Copy the key and save it somewhere safe. We will use it in the next step of the tutorial.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">复制密钥并将其保存在安全的地方。我们将在本教程的下一步中使用它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="step-3---configure-environment-variables-and-start-the-application">Step 3 - Configure environment variables and start the application<a class="hash-link" href="#step-3---configure-environment-variables-and-start-the-application" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">第 3 步 - 配置环境变量并启动应用程序</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>We need to add some environment variables before we can run our application. For development and testing, we can use <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/dotenv" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">dotenv</a> and configure environment files in the root directory of the app, named according to the environment, e.g. <code>'.env.development.local'</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在运行我们的应用程序之前，我们需要添加一些环境变量。环境变量允许您设置传递给服务器端代码的值。对于开发和测试，我们可以使用dotenv，在app根目录下配置环境文件，根据环境命名，例如'.env.development.local'。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-warning alert alert--danger admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5.05.31c.81 2.17.41 3.38-.52 4.31C3.55 5.67 1.98 6.45.9 7.98c-1.45 2.05-1.7 6.53 3.53 7.7-2.2-1.16-2.67-4.52-.3-6.61-.61 2.03.53 3.33 1.94 2.86 1.39-.47 2.3.53 2.27 1.67-.02.78-.31 1.44-1.13 1.81 3.42-.59 4.78-3.42 4.78-5.56 0-2.84-2.53-3.22-1.25-5.61-1.52.13-2.03 1.13-1.89 2.75.09 1.08-1.02 1.8-1.86 1.33-.67-.41-.66-1.19-.06-1.78C8.18 5.31 8.68 2.45 5.05.32L5.03.3l.02.01z"></path></svg></span>danger<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">危险</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>Care must be taken to avoid storing environment variables in source control. For this tutorial, there is a <code>.gitignore</code> file. This tells git to ignore each of the existing environment files. This prevents changes to the existing environment files from being stored in git. Make sure you add new environments to <code>.gitignore</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">必须注意避免在源代码管理中存储环境变量。对于本教程，有一个 .gitignore 文件。这告诉 git 忽略每个现有的环境文件。这可以防止对现有环境文件的更改存储在 git 中。确保将新环境添加到 .gitignore。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><p>As mentioned in the warning above, add the following lines to <code>'.gitignore'</code>:.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如上面的警告中所述，将以下行添加到“.gitignore”：。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-txt codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; For these testnets you can request some free funds to be added to your address, for Goerli this is done via <a href="https://goerlifaucet.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://goerlifaucet.com/</a>. Just input your address into the field and get some free test tokens.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">为了不在主网上转移真实的 ETH，我们使用歌尔力测试网。对于这些测试网，您可以请求将一些免费资金添加到您的地址，对于 Goerli，这是通过 https://goerlifaucet.com/ 完成的。只需在字段中输入您的地址，即可获得一些免费的测试代币。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>This transfer is going to actually fire up a event by the webhook since we are transferring funds to our monitored address. If you are following Step 1, you should already be in this folder. Otherwise, open up a terminal window and navigate to your&nbsp;<code>mailchain-hal-webhook</code>&nbsp;folder.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要安装 Mailchain SDK，您需要在项目 mailchain-hal-webhook 的基本目录中运行 npm 命令。如果您正在执行第 1 步，则您应该已经位于该文件夹中。否则，打开一个终端窗口并导航到您的 mailchain-hal-webhook 文件夹。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Install Mailchain SDK using&nbsp;<code>npm</code>:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">使用 npm 安装 Mailchain SDK：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="language-jsx codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; You'll see it contains example services, controllers, routes, etc. Later you'll extend this functionality.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在您喜欢的代码编辑器中打开 mailchain-hal-webhook。您会看到它包含示例服务、控制器、路由等。稍后您将扩展此功能。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="configuration">Configuration<a class="hash-link" href="#configuration" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">配置</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h4><p>The Mailchain SDK needs to be authenticated with your Secret Recovery Phrase to send messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain SDK 需要使用您的 Secret Recovery Phrase 进行身份验证才能发送消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><aside>💡 **Secret Recovery Phrase.** A Mailchain account is a web3 identity. Each account is created via a private key that the user owns and controls. In Mailchain's case, the Secret Recovery Phrase creates the private key. *Whoever has the Secret Recovery Phrase controls the account. You should treat Secret Recovery Phrases as if they are private keys. They MUST be kept safely and only saved in a trusted store.*<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">💡 **秘密恢复短语。** Mailchain 帐户是 web3 身份。每个帐户都是通过用户拥有和控制的私钥创建的。在 Mailchain 的例子中，Secret Recovery Phrase 创建私钥。 *谁拥有秘密恢复短语就控制该帐户。您应该将 Secret Recovery Phrases 视为私钥。它们必须安全保存，并且只能保存在受信任的商店中。*</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></aside><p>Get the Secret Recovery Phrase for your test and development Mailchain account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">为您的测试和开发 Mailchain 帐户获取秘密恢复短语。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Open&nbsp;<code>.env.development.local</code>&nbsp;in your editor, and add a new line to the bottom&nbsp;<code>SECRET_RECOVERY_PHRASE=enter your secret phrase here</code>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在您的编辑器中打开 .env.development.local，并在底部添加一个新行 SECRET_RECOVERY_PHRASE=在此处输入您的密码。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Replace&nbsp;<code>enter your secret phrase here</code>&nbsp;with your Secret Recovery Phrase and save the file.<hcfy-result Passport then looks at the request token and searches for it in the known tokens list.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的 API 将使用承载身份验证方案来验证请求。您需要创建一个已知令牌列表并将它们提供给应用程序。 Passport 然后查看请求令牌并在已知令牌列表中搜索它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><aside>💡 Bearer authentication scheme: HTTP requests use the&nbsp;`Authentication`&nbsp;header to send authentication details to the server.&nbsp;`Authentication`&nbsp;headers specify the method or authentication scheme and credentials. Bearer is an authentication scheme commonly used to authenticate HTTP API requests.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">💡 承载身份验证方案：HTTP 请求使用`Authentication` 标头将身份验证详细信息发送到服务器。 `Authentication` 标头指定方法或身份验证方案和凭据。 Bearer 是一种通常用于对 HTTP API 请求进行身份验证的身份验证方案。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></aside><p>The format for a&nbsp;<code>Bearer</code>&nbsp;authentication header is:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">不记名身份验证标头的格式为：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">"Authorization: Bearer {token}"</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-info alert alert--info admonition_qNG0"><div class="admonitionHeading_l909"><span class="admonitionIcon_UNbs"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7 2.3c3.14 0 5.7 2.56 5.7 5.7s-2.56 5.7-5.7 5.7A5.71 5.71 0 0 1 1.3 8c0-3.14 2.56-5.7 5.7-5.7zM7 1C3.14 1 0 4.14 0 8s3.14 7 7 7 7-3.14 7-7-3.14-7-7-7zm1 3H6v5h2V4zm0 6H6v2h2v-2z"></path></svg></span>info<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">信息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></div><div class="admonitionContent_oUmQ"><p>NOTE: The value of the token can be anything, usually a random generated string that is meaningless to the client. Random values make for easy authentication but since the request is not signed. Care must be taken to properly protect the token as anyone with the token can make requests.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">注意：令牌的值可以是任何东西，通常是随机生成的对客户端无意义的字符串。随机值有助于轻松进行身份验证，但因为请求未签名。必须注意妥善保护令牌，因为任何拥有令牌的人都可以发出请求。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></div><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="generate-tokens">Generate tokens<a class="hash-link" href="#generate-tokens" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">生成代币</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h4><p>You need to use a secure random generator to safely generate bearer tokens. The latest version of&nbsp;<code>openssl</code>&nbsp;implements a secure random generator that generates and formats random values of any length.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您需要使用安全的随机生成器来安全地生成不记名令牌。最新版本的 openssl 实现了一个安全的随机生成器，可以生成和格式化任意长度的随机值。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Open a terminal window and execute the following command:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">打开终端窗口并执行以下命令：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><div class="codeBlockContainer_ZGJx theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34; --prism-background-color:#f6f8fa;"><div class="codeBlockContent_qZBB"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-text codeBlock_TAPP thin-scrollbar"><code class="codeBlockLines_AdAo"><span class="token-line" style="color: rgb(57, 58, 52);"><span class="token plain">openssl rand 32 -hex</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_TNwR"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_MVhB" aria-hidden="true"><svg class="copyButtonIcon_yxgH" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_QJLJ" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div><p>Try running it again, notice that each time you run it you get a different unique value.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">尝试再次运行它，请注意每次运行它都会获得不同的唯一值。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="23-provide-tokens-to-app">2.3. Provide tokens to app<a class="hash-link" href="#23-provide-tokens-to-app" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">2.3.向应用程序提供令牌</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Your app will extract the bearer token from the HTTP request&nbsp;<code>Authorization</code>&nbsp;header. It will then look for the supplied bearer token in a list of known tokens. If it finds a match then the server will authenticate the request.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您的应用将从 HTTP 请求授权标头中提取不记名令牌。然后它将在已知令牌列表中查找提供的不记名令牌。如果找到匹配项，则服务器将对请求进行身份验证。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The known tokens are stored in the&nbsp;<code>BEARER_TOKENS</code>&nbsp;environment variable.&nbsp;<code>BEARER_TOKENS</code>&nbsp;is a comma separated list, meaning you can join multiple outputs from&nbsp;<a href="/developer/tutorials/authenticated-webhook#generate-tokens">generate tokens</a>&nbsp;with commas to create a list of tokens for you API. HAL Notify makes it easy to implement web3 notifications which can be triggered by any EVM state change, smart contract, wallet and more. HAL supports multiple channels for receiving notifications, including sending to webhooks. In this case, HAL will use your API as a webhook and we will get the public endpoint from gitpod.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">HAL 提供无代码 web3 基础设施。 HAL Notify 可以轻松实现 web3 通知，这些通知可以由任何 EVM 状态更改、智能合约、钱包等触发。 HAL 支持多个接收通知的渠道，包括发送到 webhook。在这种情况下，HAL 将使用您的 API 作为 webhook，我们将从 gitpod 获取公共端点。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="51-configure-your-notifications-in-the-hal-app">5.1. __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">通过 Mailchain 发出温柔的警报</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1></header><p>This tutorial shows you how to integrate Tenderly Alerts which can trigger notifications for on-chain events and send them directly to an EVM address, ENS name or Unstoppable domain via Mailchain.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">本教程向您展示如何集成 Tenderly Alerts，它可以触发链上事件的通知，并通过 Mailchain 将它们直接发送到 EVM 地址、ENS 名称或 Unstoppable 域。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="why-might-you-want-to-do-this">Why might you want to do this?<a class="hash-link" href="#why-might-you-want-to-do-this" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">你为什么要这样做？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><ul class=""><li>Notify users about new transfers to their address, e.g. creating a blockexplorer.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">通知用户有关新的转移到他们的地址，例如创建一个区块浏览器。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Notify about a volume of trades over a threshold, e.g. defi platform<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">通知超过阈值的交易量，例如defi平台</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Notify users about changes to their address for security purposes.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">出于安全目的，通知用户有关其地址的更改。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ul><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="background">Background<a __hcfy__result__inline__">背景</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p><a href="https://docs.tenderly.co/alerts/intro-to-alerts" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tenderly Alerting</a> listens for events on the blockchain and sends real-time notifications to your desired destination when the event occurs. With Tenderly Alerting, you can stay informed about desired or undesired events related to transitions, wallets, smart contracts, or any other activity on the network.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Tenderly Alerting 监听区块链上的事件，并在事件发生时将实时通知发送到您想要的目的地。通过 Tenderly Alerting，您可以随时了解与转换、钱包、智能合约或网络上任何其他活动相关的所需或不需要的事件。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><a href="https://docs.mailchain.com/developer" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mailchain</a> is the communication layer for Web3. With Mailchain, people can communicate using their Web3 identities through a private, end-to-end encrypted mail experience. The open source Mailchain SDK provides a way for developers to integrate using patterns that easily recompose, adapt, and extend.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 是 Web3 的通信层。借助 Mailchain，人们可以通过私有的、端到端的加密邮件体验使用他们的 Web3 身份进行通信。开源 Mailchain SDK 为开发人员提供了一种使用易于重构、调整和扩展的模式进行集成的方法。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h1>Tutorial: Create a Tenderly Webhook<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">教程：创建 Tenderly Webhook</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="solution-overview">Solution Overview<a class="hash-link" href="#solution-overview" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">解决方案概述</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><p>In this tutorial we’ll use a simple Express App that exposes an API webhook that can be called based on on-chain events. We will be using Tenderly, which can deliver alerts based on simple or advanced triggers from transactions and events.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">在本教程中，我们将使用一个简单的 Express 应用程序，它公开了一个可以根据链上事件调用的 API webhook。我们将使用 Tenderly，它可以根据来自交易和事件的简单或高级触发器提供警报。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>This demonstrates how to setup the webhook that can deliver alerts for use cases including: balance changes, user receipts for NFT purchases, welcome messages, alerting your team of failed transactions and more.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">这演示了如何设置可以为用例发送警报的 webhook，包括：余额变化、NFT 购买的用户收据、欢迎消息、提醒您的团队交易失败等等。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h1>Prerequisites<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">先决条件</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>To complete this tutorial, you need to first:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">要完成本教程，您首先需要：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ol><li>Download and install&nbsp;<a href="https://nodejs.org/en/download/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NodeJS</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">下载并安装 NodeJS。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li><a href="https://docs.mailchain.com/user/guides/getting-started/create-a-mailchain-account" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Create a new Mailchain account</a>&nbsp;for development and testing purposes.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">为开发和测试目的创建一个新的 Mailchain 帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>Sign in or create a <a href="https://tenderly.co/" License Agreements Instructions<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Mailchain 贡献者许可协议说明</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><p>Mailchain welcomes and greatly appreciates contributions from the community.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 欢迎并非常感谢社区的贡献。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Mailchain uses various agreements to accept contributions of software code and documentation from individuals, corporations and other entities, and to accept larger grants of existing software products.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 使用各种协议来接受来自个人、公司和其他实体的软件代码和文档的贡献，并接受对现有软件产品的更大资助。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>These agreements help us achieve our goal of providing reliable and long-lived software products through collaborative, open-source software development. In all cases, contributors retain full rights to use their original contributions for any other purpose outside of Mailchain, while providing Mailchain the right to distribute and build upon their work.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">这些协议帮助我们实现了通过协作、开源软件开发提供可靠和长期使用的软件产品的目标。在所有情况下，贡献者保留将其原始贡献用于 Mailchain 之外的任何其他目的的全部权利，同时向 Mailchain 提供分发和构建其作品的权利。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="contributor-license-agreements">Contributor License Agreements<a class="hash-link" href="#contributor-license-agreements" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">贡献者许可协议</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>"ICLA": <a href="https://github.com/mailchain/CLA/raw/main/CLAs/Individual%20Contributor%20License%20Agreement.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Individual Contributor License Agreement</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">“ICLA”：个人贡献者许可协议</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>"ECLA": <a href="https://github.com/mailchain/CLA/raw/main/CLAs/Entity%20Contributor%20License%20Agreement.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Entity Contributor License Agreement</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">“ECLA”：实体贡献者许可协议</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>All contributors of ideas, code, or documentation to Mailchain must complete, agree and sign the agreement via either email or electronic submission.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 的所有想法、代码或文档的贡献者必须通过电子邮件或电子提交完成、同意并签署协议。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The purpose of the agreement is to clearly define the terms under which intellectual property has been contributed to Mailchain and thereby allow us to defend the project should there be a legal dispute regarding the software. An individual must have submitted a signed ICLA to Mailchain before we give them commit rights to Mailchain.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">该协议的目的是明确定义将知识产权贡献给 Mailchain 的条款，从而允许我们在软件发生法律纠纷时为项目辩护。在我们授予他们提交 Mailchain 的权利之前，个人必须向 Mailchain 提交签名的 ICLA。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>For a corporation or other entity that assigns employees to work on Mailchain, an Entity CLA (ECLA) is available to cover contributing intellectual property via the corporation that may have been assigned as part of an employment agreement.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">对于指派员工在 Mailchain 上工作的公司或其他实体，实体 CLA (ECLA) 可用于涵盖通过公司贡献的知识产权，这些知识产权可能已作为雇佣协议的一部分被指派。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The ECLA legally binds the corporation or other entity, so a person with authority to enter into legal contracts on behalf of the corporation or other entity must sign it.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">ECLA 对公司或其他实体具有法律约束力，因此有权代表公司或其他实体签订法律合同的人必须签署它。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>The ICLA an individual signs is not tied to any employer they may have, so we recommend that individuals use their personal email addresses in the contact details, rather than their @work addresses.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">ICLA 个人标志与他们可能拥有的任何雇主无关，因此我们建议个人在联系方式中使用他们的个人电子邮件地址，而不是他们的@work 地址。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-to-submitting-license-agreements">How-To: Submitting License Agreements<a class="hash-link" href="#how-to-submitting-license-agreements" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">操作方法：提交许可协议</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="electronic-submission-via-github-as-part-of-a-pull-request">Electronic Submission via Github (As Part of a Pull Request)<a class="hash-link" href="#electronic-submission-via-github-as-part-of-a-pull-request" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">通过 Github 以电子方式提交（作为 Pull Request 的一部分）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h4><p>When you submit a pull request, Mailchain checks that you have signed an ECLA or ICLA.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当您提交拉取请求时，Mailchain 会检查您是否签署了 ECLA 或 ICLA。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>If you have not yet signed a CLA, the CLA assistant will add a comment with a link to the Contributor License Agreement (see example image below).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您尚未签署 CLA，CLA 助手将添加一条评论，其中包含指向贡献者许可协议的链接（参见下面的示例图片）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Unsigned CLA Check in Github" src="/assets/images/cla_unsigned-9e5fe779c75885749a29b774e4814feb.png" width="450" height="88" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>Please review and fill in required information, then accept the CLA. (You may need to sign in with Github)<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请查看并填写必填信息，然后接受 CLA。 （您可能需要使用 Github 登录）</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="CLA Assistant" src="/assets/images/cla_assistant-39105c1f6cb1e15b9a398021f6d3cc0b.png" width="450" height="229" class="img__Ss2"></p><p>The check in Github should then indicate the CLA has been signed (see example image below).<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Github 中的支票应该表明 CLA 已经签署（参见下面的示例图片）。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p><img loading="lazy" alt="Unsigned CLA Check in Github" src="data:image/png;base64," width="450" height="70" class="img__Ss2"></p><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="email-submission">Email Submission<a class="hash-link" href="#email-submission" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">电子邮件提交</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h4><p>You may sign documents by hand or by electronic signature (e-signature), and submit them by email.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">您可以手写或通过电子签名（e-signature）签署文件，并通过电子邮件提交。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ul class=""><li><p><em>Signing by hand:</em> When submitting by email, please fill in the form with a PDF viewer, then print and sign it, scan all pages into a single PDF file, and attach the PDF file to an email addressed to <a href="mailto:support@mailchain.co" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">support@mailchain.co</a>. <hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">手工签名：通过电子邮件提交时，请使用 PDF 查看器填写表格，然后打印并签名，将所有页面扫描成一个 PDF 文件，并将 PDF 文件附加到电子邮件中，地址为 support@mailchain.co。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--><br>
If possible, send the attachment from the email address you list in the document. Send only one attached document per email.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果可能，请从您在文档中列出的电子邮件地址发送附件。每封电子邮件仅发送一份附件文件。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li><li><p><em>E-signature:</em> Please contact <a href="mailto:support@mailchain.co" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">support@mailchain.co</a> and request an e-sign CLA, specifying ICLA or ECLA.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">电子签名：请联系 support@mailchain.co 并请求电子签名 CLA，指定 ICLA 或 ECLA。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></li></ul><h4 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="please-note">Please Note:<a class="hash-link" href="#please-note" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">请注意：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h4><p>Note that typing your name in the field at the bottom of the document is not signing, regardless of the font that you use.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">请注意，无论您使用何种字体，在文档底部的字段中键入您的姓名都不是签名。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>A valid signature involves one of:
Accepting the CLA via the CLA Assistant (Electronic Submission via Github)
Writing your signature by hand on a printed copy of the document
Digitally signing the document by hand-drawing a signature
Signing the document via DocuSign<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">有效签名涉及以下其中一项： 通过 CLA Assistant 接受 CLA（通过 Github 电子提交） 在文档的打印副本上手写签名 通过手绘签名对文档进行数字签名 通过 DocuSign 对文档进行签名</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>We will not accept unsigned documents.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">我们不接受未签名的文件。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="questions">Questions?<a class="hash-link" href="#questions" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">有问题吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Questions about any of these steps are welcome. Please contact <a href="https://docs.mailchain.com/getting-help" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">support</a>.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">欢迎对这些步骤中的任何一个提出问题。请联系支持。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav class="pagination-nav docusaurus-mt-lg" aria-label="Docs pages navigation"><a
