__hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">经常问的问题</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h1><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="general">General<a class="hash-link" href="#general" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">一般</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-is-mailchain">What is Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-is-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">什么是邮件链？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain is the communication layer for web3. It makes it possible for people to communicate in a crypto-native way. The platform consists of two parts:<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 是 web3 的通信层。它使人们有可能以加密原生的方式进行交流。该平台由两部分组成：</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><ol><li>An open source, multi-chain protocol for sending encrypted messages between blockchain wallet addresses.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">一种开源的多链协议，用于在区块链钱包地址之间发送加密消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li><li>A simple, unified inbox application that makes it easy for users to view and send messages using the protocol and to keep track of their on-chain activity.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">一个简单、统一的收件箱应用程序，使用户可以使用该协议轻松查看和发送消息，并跟踪他们的链上活动。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></li></ol><p>It's as simple as using email.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">就像使用电子邮件一样简单。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-problem-is-mailchain-solving">What problem is Mailchain solving?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-problem-is-mailchain-solving" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Mailchain 解决什么问题？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Today, there is no direct way to communicate via blockchain wallet addresses in a crypto-native way. Users are forced to make trade-offs when they link email addresses and lose pseudo-anonymity, or join chat groups for broadcast messages where it's hard to keep track of relevant communication.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">今天，没有直接的方式以加密原生方式通过区块链钱包地址进行通信。用户在链接电子邮件地址和失去伪匿名性时被迫做出权衡，或者加入难以跟踪相关通信的广播消息的聊天组。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Without communication as a first class citizen, many actions taken for granted on the Internet cannot take place in web3. Users can’t receive direct communications related to their savings, loans, and financial positions. They can’t receive information from projects they care about in the context of how they interact with them. They can’t contact others in their community, for example, to make an offer to purchase a digital collectible. Businesses can’t receive receipts for payments, or invoices. Developers can’t be reached in the event of security issues and can’t send out important communications to their users if there is an issue, upgrade, or decision to be made. Adoption is held back.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">没有通信作为一等公民，许多在互联网上理所当然的行为是无法在 web3 中发生的。用户无法接收与其储蓄、贷款和财务状况相关的直接通信。在他们如何与他们互动的背景下，他们无法从他们关心的项目中接收信息。例如，他们无法联系社区中的其他人来提出购买数字收藏品的要约。企业无法收到付款收据或发票。如果出现安全问题，则无法联系到开发人员，如果有问题、升级或需要做出决定，也无法向用户发送重要信息。采用被阻止。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="why-do-i-need-mailchain">Why do I need Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#why-do-i-need-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">为什么我需要 Mailchain？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain acts as your web3 inbox, receiving messages in the context of your identities. Digital art-related messages get sent to your digital collector identity, gaming-related notifications get sent to your gaming identity, and DeFi notifications get sent to your DeFi identity. Mailchain gives you the power to communicate and maintain privacy at the same time.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 充当您的 web3 收件箱，在您的身份上下文中接收消息。与数字艺术相关的消息会发送到您的数字收藏家身份，与游戏相关的通知会发送到您的游戏身份，而 DeFi 通知会发送到您的 DeFi 身份。 Mailchain 使您能够同时进行通信和维护隐私。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="how-much-does-it-cost-to-send-a-message-on-mailchain">How much does it cost to send a message on Mailchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#how-much-does-it-cost-to-send-a-message-on-mailchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">在 Mailchain 上发送消息需要多少费用？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain’s economic model is designed to be sustainable. It provides a "public good" quota of free messages for human users ensuring anyone can have access to secure, private communication at no cost. The model also supports the protocol and its infrastructure providers through message fees for high volume senders. Fees are targeted to be below $0.005.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 的经济模型旨在实现可持续发展。它为人类用户提供了“公益”配额的免费消息，确保任何人都可以免费访问安全、私密的通信。该模型还通过向大容量发送者收取消息费用来支持该协议及其基础设施提供商。费用目标是低于 0.005 美元。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="can-i-send-a-message-to-or-receive-email-from-a-traditional-email-address">Can I send a message to or receive email from a traditional email address?<a class="hash-link" href="#can-i-send-a-message-to-or-receive-email-from-a-traditional-email-address" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">我可以向传统电子邮件地址发送消息或从传统电子邮件地址接收电子邮件吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Not yet. Mailchain is a web3 communication protocol that works with web3 identities (e.g. blockchain wallet addresses and names), guaranteeing end-to-end encryption and verified sender origin. It does not support sending messages to or from traditional email. There is an open feature request here <a href="https://go.mailchain.com/feat-traditional-email" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://go.mailchain.com/feat-traditional-email</a>. We'd love to hear your thoughts on this.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">还没有。 Mailchain 是一种 web3 通信协议，它与 web3 身份（例如区块链钱包地址和名称）一起工作，保证端到端加密和验证发件人来源。它不支持向传统电子邮件发送消息或从传统电子邮件发送消息。这里有一个开放的功能请求 https://go.mailchain.com/feat-traditional-email。我们很想听听您对此的看法。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="protocol--decentralization">Protocol &amp; Decentralization<a class="hash-link" href="#protocol--decentralization" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">协议和去中心化</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="why-has-mailchain-developed-its-own-protocol">Why has Mailchain developed its own protocol?<a class="hash-link" href="#why-has-mailchain-developed-its-own-protocol" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">为什么 Mailchain 开发了自己的协议？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>There is no purpose-built communication protocol that supports group or one-to-one, end-to-end encrypted messaging between web3 identities.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">没有专门构建的通信协议支持 web3 身份之间的组或一对一、端到端加密消息传递。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>There are big challenges related to using other protocols. Constraints include scalability, security, and price volatility challenges.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">使用其他协议存在很大的挑战。约束包括可扩展性、安全性和价格波动挑战。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Mailchain's protocol is purpose built for secure and private communication. It natively handles encryption, addressing, key lookups, transport, and storage.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 的协议专为安全和私密的通信而构建。它本机处理加密、寻址、密钥查找、传输和存储。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="will-mailchain-be-fully-decentralized">Will Mailchain be fully decentralized?<a class="hash-link" href="#will-mailchain-be-fully-decentralized" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">Mailchain 会完全去中心化吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Yes. Mailchain will be progressively decentralized. Our initial priorities are user experience, security, and supporting user-owned identity and data. Mailchain will then decentralize its protocol functions with an incentivization structure that encourages members of the community to participate in running infrastructure.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">是的。 Mailchain 将逐步去中心化。我们最初的优先事项是用户体验、安全性以及支持用户拥有的身份和数据。然后，Mailchain 将通过鼓励社区成员参与运行基础设施的激励结构来分散其协议功能。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="can-someone-run-their-own-mailchain-infrastructure">Can someone run their own Mailchain infrastructure?<a class="hash-link" href="#can-someone-run-their-own-mailchain-infrastructure" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">有人可以运行自己的 Mailchain 基础设施吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>As protocol functions are decentralized, anyone will be able to run their own Mailchain infrastructure.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">由于协议功能是去中心化的，任何人都可以运行自己的 Mailchain 基础设施。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="why-would-someone-run-mailchain-infrastructure">Why would someone run Mailchain infrastructure?<a class="hash-link" href="#why-would-someone-run-mailchain-infrastructure" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">为什么有人会运行 Mailchain 基础设施？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Businesses may want to run their own infrastructure to control how and where messages are stored. Other community members or service providers may run infrastructure in order to receive rewards.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">企业可能希望运行自己的基础架构来控制消息的存储方式和存储位置。其他社区成员或服务提供商可能会运行基础设施以获得奖励。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="mailchain-account-security">Mailchain Account Security<a class="hash-link" href="#mailchain-account-security" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">邮件链账户安全</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-is-a-secret-recovery-phrase">What is a Secret Recovery Phrase?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-is-a-secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">什么是秘密恢复短语？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>A Secret Recovery Phrase, sometimes known as a "mnemonic seed phrase" is used to mathematically derive all the messaging keys, private keys, signatures and other secrets for your account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">秘密恢复短语，有时称为“助记种子短语”，用于从数学上推导出您帐户的所有消息传递密钥、私钥、签名和其他秘密。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>It should never be shared with anyone because doing so would give full, irrevocable access to your account. A Secret Recovery Phrase cannot be changed or recovered.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">永远不要与任何人共享它，因为这样做会提供对您帐户的完全、不可撤销的访问权限。秘密恢复短语无法更改或恢复。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="who-can-access-my-account-information">Who can access my account information?<a class="hash-link" href="#who-can-access-my-account-information" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">谁可以访问我的帐户信息？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Only you are able to access your account information and data using your Secret Recovery Phrase or account password. Mailchain <em>cannot</em> access your account or account information.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">只有您可以使用您的秘密恢复短语或帐户密码访问您的帐户信息和数据。 Mailchain 无法访问您的帐户或帐户信息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-password">What happens if I forget or lose my password?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-password" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记或丢失密码怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget or lose your password, you can recover your account using your Secret Recovery Phrase.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记或丢失了密码，您可以使用您的秘密恢复短语恢复您的帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-secret-recovery-phrase">What happens if I forget or lose my Secret Recovery Phrase?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-or-lose-my-secret-recovery-phrase" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记或丢失了我的秘密助记词怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget or lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, you can recover your account if you know your Mailchain username and password.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记或丢失了您的 Secret Recovery Phrase，如果您知道您的 Mailchain 用户名和密码，则可以恢复您的帐户。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-happens-if-i-forget-my-secret-recovery-phrase-and-my-password">What happens if I forget my Secret Recovery Phrase and my password?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-happens-if-i-forget-my-secret-recovery-phrase-and-my-password" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我忘记了我的秘密助记词和密码会怎样？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>If you forget your Secret Recovery Phrase and your password, your account will be inaccessible.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">如果您忘记了您的秘密恢复短语和密码，您的帐户将无法访问。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="will-my-data-be-accessible-after-i-have-recovered-my-account">Will my data be accessible after I have recovered my account?<a class="hash-link" href="#will-my-data-be-accessible-after-i-have-recovered-my-account" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">恢复帐户后我的数据可以访问吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>When you log in to Mailchain with your Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination, your messages, registered wallets, settings, etc. will be accessible to you.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">当您使用您的秘密恢复短语或用户名和密码组合登录 Mailchain 时，您将可以访问您的消息、注册的钱包、设置等。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="what-should-i-do-if-i-suspect-my-secret-recovery-phrase-or-username-and-password-combination-have-been-compromised">What should I do if I suspect my Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination have been compromised?<a class="hash-link" href="#what-should-i-do-if-i-suspect-my-secret-recovery-phrase-or-username-and-password-combination-have-been-compromised" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">如果我怀疑我的秘密助记词或用户名和密码组合已被泄露，我该怎么办？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Any user who suspects their Secret Recovery Phrase or username and password combination has been compromised should create a new account and migrate their blockchain addresses by re-registering them with the new account. Any new messages will now use the messaging keys for the new account.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">任何怀疑其 Secret Recovery Phrase 或用户名和密码组合已被泄露的用户都应创建一个新帐户并通过使用新帐户重新注册来迁移其区块链地址。任何新消息现在都将使用新帐户的消息密钥。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="data--messages">Data &amp; Messages<a class="hash-link" href="#data--messages" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">数据和信息</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h2><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="who-can-read-my-messages">Who can read my messages?<a class="hash-link" href="#who-can-read-my-messages" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">谁可以阅读我的消息？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain messages are encrypted end-to-end. This means that once the sender has encrypted a message using the recipient's encryption key, only the recipient is able to decrypt it. The sender also keeps an encrypted version of the message.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">邮件链消息是端到端加密的。这意味着一旦发件人使用收件人的加密密钥加密了消息，只有收件人能够解密它。发件人还保留消息的加密版本。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><p>Mailchain <em>cannot</em> read your messages, the storage provider <em>cannot</em> read your messages, your internet service provider <em>cannot</em> read your messages.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 无法读取您的消息，存储提供商无法读取您的消息，您的互联网服务提供商无法读取您的消息。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="where-is-my-data-stored">Where is my data stored?<a class="hash-link" href="#where-is-my-data-stored" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">我的数据存储在哪里？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>Mailchain stores encrypted message data on IPFS and other distributed object stores.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">Mailchain 在 IPFS 和其他分布式对象存储上存储加密的消息数据。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p><h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_fF9Z" id="are-my-messages-stored-on-the-blockchain">Are my messages stored on the blockchain?<a class="hash-link" href="#are-my-messages-stored-on-the-blockchain" title="Direct link to heading">&ZeroWidthSpace;</a><hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__ __hcfy__result__inline__">我的消息存储在区块链上吗？</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></h3><p>No. When a message is sent, the message is encrypted and stored on distributed storage. An encrypted "delivery request", which contains information for the message recipient to be able to collect their encrypted message, is sent as a blockchain transaction. Once a message has been collected, it will be stored in the recipient's inbox, and can be removed from the distributed storage location.<hcfy-result class="__hcfy__result__both__ __hcfy__result__loaded__">不会。发送消息时，消息会被加密并存储在分布式存储中。加密的“交付请求”作为区块链交易发送，其中包含消息接收者能够收集其加密消息的信息。收集到消息后，它将存储在收件人的收件箱中，并且可以从分布式存储位置中删除。</hcfy-result><!--hcfy-anchor--></p></div></article><nav
